TEXT.Italian: A change in the currents has disrupted usual spawning patterns, and fishermen trawling from the ports of %s2_city are hauling in an unusually rich catch. Although seasonal yields are booming, local elders grumble that such intense harvesting may jeopardize the catch in years to come.
TEXT.Spanish: A change in the currents has disrupted usual spawning patterns, and fishermen trawling from the ports of %s2_city are hauling in an unusually rich catch. Although seasonal yields are booming, local elders grumble that such intense harvesting may jeopardize the catch in years to come.

TEXT.English: Attracted by wild rumours of rich local silver deposits, foreign prospectors have been pouring into the mountains near %s2_city. Before long, these itinerant claim jumpers will have the best pickings for themselves!
TEXT.French: Attiré par des rumeurs étranges à propos de gisements d'argent abondants, les prospecteurs étrangers indépendants se ruent dans les montagnes près de %s2_city. Ces itinérants souhaitent certainement garder les meilleurs prises pour eux-mêmes !
TEXT.German: Durch wilde Gerüchte bezüglich reicher Silbervorkommen angelockt, strömen fremde Glücksuchende in die Berge nahe %s2_city. Bald werden diese die besten Claims für sich beansprucht haben!
TEXT.Italian: Attracted by wild rumors of rich local silver deposits, independent foreign prospectors have been pouring into the mountains near %s2_city. Before long, these itinerant claimjumpers may have taken the best pickings for themselves!
TEXT.Spanish: Attracted by wild rumors of rich local silver deposits, independent foreign prospectors have been pouring into the mountains near %s2_city. Before long, these itinerant claimjumpers may have taken the best pickings for themselves!

TEXT.English: The townsfolk are whispering that a large family of recent immigrants to %s2_city are witches! They keep to themselves, grow strange roots in cottage gardens, and don't attend church on Sundays. One of them even has a birthmark!
TEXT.French: Le bruit cour qu'une famille de récents immigrants à %s2_city est en fait composée de sorcières ! Elles restent entre elles, font pousser d'étranges racines dans leur jardin, et ne vont pas à l'église le dimanche. L'une d'elles a même une tache de naissance !
TEXT.German: Die Bevölkerung flüstert, dass eine grosse Familie, die kürzlich in %s2_city eingewandert ist, unter dem Verdacht der Hexerei steht. Sie bleiben unter sich, bauen seltsame Wurzeln und Kräuter an und nehmen nicht an Gottesdiensten teil. Einer von Ihnen hat sogar ein auffallendes Geburtsmal.
TEXT.Italian: The townsfolk are whispering that a large family of recent immigrants to %s2_city are suspected to be witches! They keep to themselves, grow strange roots in cottage gardens, and don't attend church on Sundays. One of them even has a birthmark!
TEXT.Spanish: The townsfolk are whispering that a large family of recent immigrants to %s2_city are suspected to be witches! They keep to themselves, grow strange roots in cottage gardens, and don't attend church on Sundays. One of them even has a birthmark!

TEXT.English: Our beloved monarch has suddenly developed an eccentric opinion that tobacco smoking is injurious to the lungs, even going so far as to publish a pamphlet denouncing the habit. This bizarre idea could ruin our export market!
TEXT.French: Notre Monarque bien-aimé a soudainement développé l'idée farfelue que fumer du tabac serait mauvais pour les poumons, allant jusqu'à autoriser la publication d'un pamphlet dénonçant cette habitude. Cette idée saugrenue pourrait ruiner nos exportations !
TEXT.German: Unser geliebter Herrscher hat kürzlich eine exzentrische Meinung zum Tabakgenuss entwickelt. Er glaubt, dies sei schadhaft für die Lungen. Er will sogar so weit gehen ein Pamphlet zu veröffentlichen, dass davor warnt. Dies bizarre Idee kann unsere Exporteinnahmen schwer schädigen.
TEXT.Italian: Our beloved monarch has suddenly developed an eccentric opinion that tobacco smoking is injurious to the lungs, even going so far as to publish a pamphlet denouncing the habit. This bizarre idea could ruin our export market!
TEXT.Spanish: Our beloved monarch has suddenly developed an eccentric opinion that tobacco smoking is injurious to the lungs, even going so far as to publish a pamphlet denouncing the habit. This bizarre idea could ruin our export market!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Nobles and citizens are following the example of their king. Demand for our colonial goods is declining.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Nobles and citizens are following the example of their king. Demand for our colonial goods is declining.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Eure Antwort wurde dem König zugetragen. Kammerdiener berichten, er habe gleich eine Probe verköstigt und anschließend huldvoll genickt.[NEWLINE]Adlige und reiche Bürger in unserer Heimat eifern nun dem König nach. Die Nachfrage nach unseren Kolonialwaren sinkt.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Nobles and citizens are following the example of their king. Demand for our colonial goods is declining.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Nobles and citizens are following the example of their king. Demand for our colonial goods is declining.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The king receives word that his citizens in the colonies are questioning his judgment in this matter.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The king receives word that his citizens in the colonies are questioning his judgment.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Der König ist höchst unerfreut dass man sein Urteil zu dieser Angelegenheit in Frage stellt.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The king receives word that his citizens in the colonies are questioning his judgment.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The king receives word that his citizens in the colonies are questioning his judgment.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The price increases since, due to the new offer, citizens are now aware that train oil burns better than tallow[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The price increases since - due to the new offer - the citizens become aware that train oil burns better than tallow[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Die Nachfrage nach edlem Tranöl in Europa steigt, da die braven Bürger sich aufgrund des neuen Angebots darüber bewusst werden, dass öl besser brennt als Talg.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The price increases since - due to the new offer - the citizens become aware that train oil burns better than tallow[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The price increases since - due to the new offer - the citizens become aware that train oil burns better than tallow[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Your Lordship, the Royal Navy has requisitioned one of our finest ships to aid in a campaign against the Barbary Pirates. How shall we respond?
TEXT.French: Votre Honneur, la marine Royale a réquisitionné l'un de nos meilleurs navires pour aider dans une campagne contre des pirates barbares. Comment devons-nous répondre ?
TEXT.German: Exzellenz, die Royal Navy hat eines unserer besten Schiffe requiriert um in einer Kampagne gegen Piraten zu unterstützen. Wie sollen wir darauf reagieren?
TEXT.Italian: Your Lordship, the Royal Navy has requisitioned one of our finest ships to aid in a campaign against the Barbary Pirates. How shall we respond?
TEXT.Spanish: Your Lordship, the Royal Navy has requisitioned one of our finest ships to aid in a campaign against the Barbary Pirates. How shall we respond?

TEXT.English: The Royal Court has been taken with the picturesque garb and customs of certain of our converted native subjects, and has sent for them to be transported to Europe.
TEXT.French: La Cour Royale a été saisie de joie en voyant les tenues pittoresques des sauvages. Le Roi souhaite que vous rapportiez un converti à la Cour.
TEXT.German: Der königliche Hof ist fasziniert von der Kunst und Geschichten der Ureinwohner. Man wünscht, dass wir einen Konvertierten Ureinwohner nach Europa schicken.
TEXT.Italian: The Royal Court has been taken with the picturesque garb and customs of certain of our native converts, and has sent for them to be transported to Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: The Royal Court has been taken with the picturesque garb and customs of certain of our native converts, and has sent for them to be transported to Europe.

TEXT.English: The Royal Navy has requisitioned 200 tons of Lumber for the construction of new ships. The goods are to be collected as soon as possible at the docks of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: La Marine Royale a réquisitionné 200 tonnes de bois pour la construction de ses nouveaux navires. Les biens sont à collecter le plus tôt possible aux docks de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Die Royal Navy hat 200 Tonnen Holz für den Bau neuer Schiffe angefordert. Das Holz soll so bald wie möglich ine einer Siedlung mit Dock oder Zollhaus bereitgestellt werden.
TEXT.Italian: The Royal Navy has requisitioned 200 tons of lumber for the construction of new ships. The goods are to be collected as soon as possible at any settlement with a Dock or Customs House.
TEXT.Spanish: The Royal Navy has requisitioned 200 tons of lumber for the construction of new ships. The goods are to be collected as soon as possible at any settlement with a Dock or Customs House.

TEXT.English: Fulfill these requirements for the following results:
TEXT.French: Répondez à la demande pour les résultats suivants :
TEXT.German: Leider ist es unserer bescheidenen Wirtschaft nicht möglich dieser Anfrage gerecht zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: Alas, I regret to inform you that our humble industries have not the capacity to meet this demand.
TEXT.Spanish: Alas, I regret to inform you that our humble industries have not the capacity to meet this demand.

TEXT.English: Representatives of the Royal Navy have arrived at %s2_city to take delivery of 200 tons of lumber, as promised per our previous arrangement.
TEXT.French: Les représentants de la Marine Royale sont arrivés à %s2_city pour prendre livraison des 200 tonnes de bois, comme convenu lors de notre dernier arrangement.
TEXT.German: Representanten der Royal Navy sind in %s2_city angekommen um die versprochene Lieferung der 200 Tonnen Holz entgegen zu nehmen.
TEXT.Italian: Representatives of the Royal Navy have arrived at %s2_city to take delivery of 200 tons of lumber, as promised per our previous arrangement.
TEXT.Spanish: Representatives of the Royal Navy have arrived at %s2_city to take delivery of 200 tons of lumber, as promised per our previous arrangement.

TEXT.English: His Royal Highness has decided to finance a polar expedition in search of the fabled Terra Australis. 200 crates of fine winter coats have been commissioned from the furriers of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Son Altesse Royale a décidé de financer une expédition polaire à la recherche de la légendaire Terra Australis. 200 caisses de manteaux d'hiver fines ont été commandées aux fourreurs de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Seine königliche Hoheit hat beschlossen eine Polar-Expedition auszustatten um das sagenhafte Terra Australis zu finden. 200 Ladungen der besten Mäntel werden von den Pelzhändlern von %s2_city verlangt.
TEXT.Italian: His Royal Highness has decided to finance a polar expedition in search of the fabled Terra Australis. 200 crates of fine winter Coats have been commissioned from the furriers of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: His Royal Highness has decided to finance a polar expedition in search of the fabled Terra Australis. 200 crates of fine winter Coats have been commissioned from the furriers of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: His Majesty's explorers have arrived to collect the shipment of coats for their polar expedition.
TEXT.French: Les explorateurs de Sa Majesté sont arrivés pour prendre livraion des manteaux à l'usage de l'expédition polaire.
TEXT.German: Die Entdecker seiner Majestät sind angekommen um die Ladung Mäntel für die Polar-Expedition abzuholen.
TEXT.Italian: His Majesty's explorers have arrived to collect the shipment of Coats for their polar expedition.
TEXT.Spanish: His Majesty's explorers have arrived to collect the shipment of Coats for their polar expedition.

TEXT.English: It has been quite some time, and the agreed-upon goods have yet to be delivered to %s2_city. His Majesty is not accustomed to being kept waiting!
TEXT.French: Cela fait déjà un certain temps, et les biens convenus n'ont toujours pas été livrés à %s2_city. Sa Majesté n'est pas habituée à devoir attendre !
TEXT.German: Die Verzögerung der versprochenen Warenlieferung in %s2_city ist sehr bedenklich. Ihre Majestät ist nicht erfreut!
TEXT.Italian: It has been quite some time, and the agreed-upon goods have yet to be delivered to %s2_city. His Majesty is not accustomed to being kept waiting!
TEXT.Spanish: It has been quite some time, and the agreed-upon goods have yet to be delivered to %s2_city. His Majesty is not accustomed to being kept waiting!

TEXT.English: By royal decree, all further trading in coats shall be done through duly authorized agents of the Hudson Bay Company.
TEXT.French: Par décrêt royal, tout prochain commerce de manteau devra être réalisé par des agents dûment autorisés de la compagnie de la Baie d'Hudson.
TEXT.German: Laut königlichen Beschluss dürfen alle weiteren Handelsgeschäfte mit Pelzen ab sofort nur noch durch Vertreter der Hudson Bay Company erfolgen.
TEXT.Italian: By royal decree, all further trading in Coats shall be done through the agents of the Hudson Bay Company.
TEXT.Spanish: By royal decree, all further trading in Coats shall be done through the agents of the Hudson Bay Company.

TEXT.English: A band of dastardly horse rustlers has seized the finest animals in our herd, and threatens to torch the barns if they are pursued.
TEXT.French: Une ignoble bande de voleurs de chevaux a saisi les plus beaux animaux de notre troupeau, et menace de mettre le feu aux granges si ils sont poursuivis.
TEXT.German: Eine Bande von niederträchtigen Pferdedieben hat die besten Tiere unserer Herde geraubt und droht sogar damit die Stallungen und Scheunen zu verbrennen, wenn Sie verfolgt werden.
TEXT.Italian: A band of dastardly horse rustlers has seized the finest animals in our herd, and threatens to torch the barns if they are pursued.
TEXT.Spanish: A band of dastardly horse rustlers has seized the finest animals in our herd, and threatens to torch the barns if they are pursued.

TEXT.English: The winter has been hard, and the guards of %s2_city have caught a band of natives from a nearby %s1_player settlement attempting to steal cattle from our herds for sustenance.
TEXT.French: L'hiver a été difficile, et les gardes de %s2_city ont attrapé une bande indigène du village voisin de %s1_player qui tentait de voler du bétail de nos troupeaux pour assurer leur subsistance.
TEXT.German: Der harte letzte Winter hat die Ureinwohner einer nahen %s1_player Siedlung dazu verleitet Vieh der Herden von %s2_city zu stehlen, doch unsere wachsame Stadtwache hat sie dabei gefangen.
TEXT.Italian: The winter has been hard, and the guards of %s2_city have caught a band of natives from a nearby %s1_player settlement attempting to steal cattle from our herds for sustenance.
TEXT.Spanish: The winter has been hard, and the guards of %s2_city have caught a band of natives from a nearby %s1_player settlement attempting to steal cattle from our herds for sustenance.

TEXT.English: Relations with your King have improved.
TEXT.French: Votre Roi est satisfait de votre réponse!
TEXT.German: Ihre Majestät ist über diese Antwort sehr erfreut.
TEXT.Italian: Your King is delighted by this reponse.
TEXT.Spanish: Your King is delighted by this reponse.

TEXT.English: Your King has been angered!
TEXT.French: Votre Roi est en colère!
TEXT.German: Ihre Majestät ist über diese Reaktion sehr verärgert.
TEXT.Italian: Your King has been angered!
TEXT.Spanish: Your King has been angered!

TEXT.English: By solemn decree of His Royal Majesty's Privy Council, your treasonous and egregious perfidy has gone on long enough! As partial recompense for your overwhelming misdeeds, a heavy fine must be paid at once into the royal coffers, or royal agents are authorized to sack the countryside of %s2_city and confiscate their undeserved wealth!
TEXT.French: Par décret Royal, votre perfidie touche à sa fin. En récompense de vos mauvaises actions, le Roi vient d'autoriser la mise à sac des de la colonie suivante: %s2_city ... A moins bien sûr que vous ne dédomagiez la Couronne!
TEXT.German: Durch unumstösslichen Beschluss Ihrer Majestät, wird euer verräterisches Handeln bestraft. Als teilweise Wiedergutmachung eurer vielen Vergehen, werdet ihr sofort eine Strafe zahlen oder königliche Abgesandte sind dazu authorisiert im Umland von %s2_city alles zu konfiszieren, was rechtmässig Ihrer Majestät gehört!
TEXT.Italian: By solemn decree of His Royal Majesty's Privy Council, your treasonous and obstreporous perfidy has gone on long enough! In partial recompense of your numerous misdeeds, a heavy fine must be paid at once into the royal coffers, or royal agents are authorized to sack the countryside of %s2_city and confiscate their rightful wealth!
TEXT.Spanish: By solemn decree of His Royal Majesty's Privy Council, your treasonous and obstreporous perfidy has gone on long enough! In partial recompense of your numerous misdeeds, a heavy fine must be paid at once into the royal coffers, or royal agents are authorized to sack the countryside of %s2_city and confiscate their rightful wealth!

TEXT.English: Through the worship and toil of your people, the Cathedral of %s2_city has been proclaimed the seat of a new Archbishopric, attracting pilgrims from surrounding churches.
TEXT.French: Par la piété et le labeur de votre peuple, la cathédrale de %s2_city a été proclamé comme le nouveau siège de l'Archevêché, attirant les pélerins de toutes les églises environnantes.
TEXT.German: Aufgrund der Verehrung durch die Bevölkerung und ihrer geschichtlichen Bedeutung, wurde die Kathedrale von %s2_city zum Sitze des Erzbischofs ernannt und zieht nun noch mehr Pilger aus der Gegend an.
TEXT.Italian: Through the worship and toil of your people, the Cathedral of %s2_city has been proclaimed the seat of a new Archbishopric, attracting pilgrims from the surrounding churches.
TEXT.Spanish: Through the worship and toil of your people, the Cathedral of %s2_city has been proclaimed the seat of a new Archbishopric, attracting pilgrims from the surrounding churches.

TEXT.English: Since your colonies have now made contact with multiple native peoples, a local merchant in %s2city proposes a modest investment in a network of trading posts that can gather rare and valuable spices from distant tribes.
TEXT.French: Maintenant que vos colonies ont pris contact avec de multiples civilisations indigènes, un marchand local de %s2city vous propose d'investir dans un réseau de poste de douane pour ainsi reccueillir des épices de valeur provenant de tribus lointaines.
TEXT.German: Da unsere Kolonien nun Kontakt zu mehreren Ureinwohnerstämmen haben, hat ein örtlicher Händler vorgeschlagen von %s2city ein Netzwerka aus Handelsposten aufzubauen, dass seltene Güter von diesen Stämmen erwirbt.
TEXT.Italian: As your colonies have now made contact with multiple native peoples, a local merchant in %s2city proposes a modest investment in a network of trading posts that can gather rare and valuable spices from distant tribes.
TEXT.Spanish: As your colonies have now made contact with multiple native peoples, a local merchant in %s2city proposes a modest investment in a network of trading posts that can gather rare and valuable spices from distant tribes.

TEXT.English: Spying the growing wealth of our sea traders, a scurvy band of pirates has gathered near our shores, demanding a thousand gold doubloons in ransom lest they put our shipping to the torch!
TEXT.French: Après avoir espionné nos négociants maritimes dont la richesse est grandissante, une bande de pirates a pillé nos côtes, demandant un millier de doublons d'or en rançon pour ne pas passer nos navires par le feux.
TEXT.German: Durch den wachsenden Reichtum unserer Seehändler angelockt, hat sich eine dreckige Bande Piraten vor unseren Küsten versammelt. Sie verlangen Tausend Golddublonen als Lösegeld damit sie unsere Schiffe nicht in Flammen aufgehen lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Spying the growing wealth of our sea traders, a scurvy band of pirates has gathered near our shores, demanding a thousand gold doubloons in ransom lest they put our shipping to the torch!
TEXT.Spanish: Spying the growing wealth of our sea traders, a scurvy band of pirates has gathered near our shores, demanding a thousand gold doubloons in ransom lest they put our shipping to the torch!

TEXT.English: The infamous pirate Lord Roc Brasiliano has sent an emissary demanding a princely fortune in gold and silver. Otherwise he threatens to send our vulnerable merchantmen to Davy Jones' locker. How shall we respond?
TEXT.French: L'infâme chef pirate Roc Brasiliano a envoyé un émissaire pour nous demander une fortune princière en or et en argent, nous menaçant d'envoyer notre vulnérable flotte marchande par le fond. Comment devons nous répondre?
TEXT.German: Der berüchtigte Piratenführer Roc Brasiliano sendet uns einen Abgesandten, der eine königliche Summe Gold und Silber fordert. Andernfalls droht er damit unsere verletzlichen Handelsschiffe auf den Grund von Davy Jones Reich zu schicken.
TEXT.Italian: The infamous pirate lord Roc Brasiliano sends an emissary demanding a princely fortune in gold and silver, threatening otherwise to send our vulnerable merchantmen to the bottom of Davy Jones' locker. How shall we respond?
TEXT.Spanish: The infamous pirate lord Roc Brasiliano sends an emissary demanding a princely fortune in gold and silver, threatening otherwise to send our vulnerable merchantmen to the bottom of Davy Jones' locker. How shall we respond?

TEXT.English: A European vintager has brought his finest wine plants to the colonies.
TEXT.French: Un vigneron européen a vendu l'une de ses meilleurs cépages à nos colonies.
TEXT.German: Ein Winzer aus Europa hat seine besten Weinpflanzen in die neue Welt verkauft.
TEXT.Italian: A European vintager has sold his finest wine plants to the colonies.
TEXT.Spanish: A European vintager has sold his finest wine plants to the colonies.

TEXT.English: A European vintager offers to sell us his best wine plants. He demands 400[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Un vigneron européen propose de vendre l'un de ses meilleurs cépages. Il demande 400[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: Ein Winzer aus Europa bietet uns seine besten Rebstöcke zum Kauf. Er verlangt 400[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Italian: A European vintager offers to sell us his best wine plants. He demands 400[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: A European vintager offers to sell us his best wine plants. He demands 400[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: Local Natives have sold some of their Red Pepper plants to European colonists.
TEXT.French: Des indigènes ont vendu leur meilleurs plants de piment aux colons européens.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner haben europäischen Kolonisten Setzlingen ihres Roten Pfeffers verkauft.
TEXT.Italian: Local Natives have sold some of their Red Pepper plants to European colonists.
TEXT.Spanish: Local Natives have sold some of their Red Pepper plants to European colonists.

TEXT.English: Local Natives offer us some seeds of their Red Pepper plants for sale. They demand 300[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Des indigènes proposent de nous vendre leurs semences pour des plants de piment. Il demande 300[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner aus der Gegend bieten uns Setzlinge ihres Roten Pfeffers zum Kauf. Sie verlangen 300[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Italian: Local Natives offer us some seeds of their Red Pepper plants for sale. They demand 300[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: Local Natives offer us some seeds of their Red Pepper plants for sale. They demand 300[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: Due to the long voyage across the sea many immigrants arrive in the New World sick and diseased.
TEXT.French: De nombreux immigrants sont arrivés malades dans le Nouveau Monde en raison du long voyage en mer.
TEXT.German: Viele Einwanderer kommen durch die lange Schiffsreise krank in der Neuen Welt an.
TEXT.Italian: Many Immigrants arrive sick and diseased in the New World due to the long voyage over sea.
TEXT.Spanish: Many Immigrants arrive sick and diseased in the New World due to the long voyage over sea.

TEXT.English: Some new immigrants have arrived. But they're diseased and weak from the long ship voyage.
TEXT.French: Quelques nouveaux immigrants sont arrivés. Mais ils semblent malade en raison du long voyage en mer.
TEXT.German: Einige neue Immigranten sind eingetroffen. Sie scheinen durch die lange Schiffreise krank geworden zu sein.
TEXT.Italian: Some new Immigrants have arrived. But they seem to be diseased and sick from the long voyage on the ships.
TEXT.Spanish: Some new Immigrants have arrived. But they seem to be diseased and sick from the long voyage on the ships.

TEXT.English: Diseases of the White Man are spreading in Native Villages.
TEXT.French: Des maladies importées d'Europe se répandent dans les villages indigènes.
TEXT.German: Die Krankheiten des Weissen Mannes verbreiten sich in den Dörfern der Ureinwohner.
TEXT.Italian: Diseases of the White Man are spreading in Native Villages.
TEXT.Spanish: Diseases of the White Man are spreading in Native Villages.

TEXT.English: A disease is spreading in a nearby Native village. The Natives believe the disease broke out after our citizens visited their village. They are now asking for help.
TEXT.French: Une maladie est en train de se propager dans un village indigène voisin. Les indigènes croient que cela fait suite à la visite de certains de nos colons et demandent de l'aide.
TEXT.German: Eine Krankheit breitet sich in einer nahegelegenen Siedlung der Wilden aus. Sie behaupten, die Krankheit sei ausgebrochen nachdem einige unserer Siedler ihr Dorf besucht hatten. Sie bitten um unsere Hilfe.
TEXT.Italian: A disease is spreading in a nearby Native village. The Natives believe the disease broke out after some of our citizens visited their village and are now asking for help.
TEXT.Spanish: A disease is spreading in a nearby Native village. The Natives believe the disease broke out after some of our citizens visited their village and are now asking for help.

TEXT.English: European Settlers have discovered a huge salt deposit near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des colons européens ont décovert un immense dépôt de sel près de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Europäische Siedler haben grosse Salzvorkommen in der Gegend um %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: European Settlers discovered a huge salt deposit near %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: European Settlers discovered a huge salt deposit near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Local settlers report that, on nearby hills in the desert, the air tastes very salty. A mining expedition might find salt deposits but it will cost 500[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Ces colons nous ont informé que l'air est particulièrement salé dans quelques collines du désert. Une expédition minière pourrait y trouver un gisement de sel, mais celle-ci coûtera 500[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: Lokale Siedler berichten, dass die Luft auf nahegelegenen Hügeln in der Wüste nach Salz riecht. Eine Minenexpedition könnte ein Salzvorkommen entdecken, wird aber 500[ICON_GOLD] kosten.
TEXT.Italian: Local settlers report that on nearby hills in the desert, the air tastes very salty. A mining expedition might find salt deposits but will cost 500[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: Local settlers report that on nearby hills in the desert, the air tastes very salty. A mining expedition might find salt deposits but will cost 500[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: Natives are angry because the White Man is hunting their Bison.
TEXT.French: Les indigènes sont en colère parce que des hommes blancs chassent leurs bisons.
TEXT.German: Die Ureinwohner sind verärgert, weil die Europäer zu viele Bisons jagen.
TEXT.Italian: Natives are angry because the White Man is hunting their Bisons.
TEXT.Spanish: Natives are angry because the White Man is hunting their Bisons.

TEXT.English: Natives from a nearby tribe approach the mayor of one of our towns and demand that we stop hunting bison in the area. They claim that by the right of their ancestors those bison belong to them. They need bison meat to survival.
TEXT.French: Des indigènes d'une tribu voisine se sont rapprochés du maire de l'une de nos villes pour demander que nous cessions de chasser le bison dans la zone. Ils prétendent que les bisons leurs appartiennent par leurs droits ancestraux, et qu'ils ne pourront survivre sans cette viande.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner eines nahegelegenen Stammes sind an uns herangetreten. Sie fordern, dass wir die Jagd auf die Bisons der Gegend einstellen. Sie behaupten, dass die Bisons durch das Recht ihrer Vorväter ihnen gehören und sie diese zum Ueberleben brauchen.
TEXT.Italian: Natives from a nearby tribe approach the mayor of one of our towns and demands that we stop hunting the bisons in the area. They claim that by the right of their ancestors those bisons belong to them and say that they need the meat of the bisons for survival.
TEXT.Spanish: Natives from a nearby tribe approach the mayor of one of our towns and demands that we stop hunting the bisons in the area. They claim that by the right of their ancestors those bisons belong to them and say that they need the meat of the bisons for survival.

TEXT.English: European colonists in %s2_city have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to the Natives.
TEXT.French: Les colons européens de %s2_city ont abbatu des arbres géants qui étaient sacrés pour les indigènes.
TEXT.German: Europäische Kolonisten aus %s2_city haben einen Giant Tree gefällt, der den Ureinwohnern heilig war.
TEXT.Italian: European colonists in %s2_city have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to the Natives.
TEXT.Spanish: European colonists in %s2_city have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to the Natives.

TEXT.English: Natives of a nearby tribe are deeply upset because our lumberjacks have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to them. They demand that the lumberjacks are handed over to them for punishment.
TEXT.French: Les indigènes d'une tribu voisine sont furieux contre nos bûcherons qui ont coupé un arbre géant qui leur était sacré. Ils demandent que les bûcherons leurs sont rendus pour les punir de leur infamie.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner eines nahegelegenen Stammes sind sehr verärgert, weil einige unserer Holzfäller einen Giant Tree gefällt haben, der ihnen heilig war. Sie fordern, dass wir ihnen die Schuldigen zur Bestrafung ausliefern.
TEXT.Italian: Natives of a nearby tribe are heavily upset because our lumberjacks have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to them. They demand that the lumberjacks are handed over to them for punishment.
TEXT.Spanish: Natives of a nearby tribe are heavily upset because our lumberjacks have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to them. They demand that the lumberjacks are handed over to them for punishment.

TEXT.English: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Thanksgiving.
TEXT.French: Des colons européens de %s2_city ont célébré leur premier Thanksgiving.
TEXT.German: Europäische Kolonisten in %s2_city haben das erste Thanksgiving gefeiert.
TEXT.Italian: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Thanksgiving.
TEXT.Spanish: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Thanksgiving.

TEXT.English: The settlers from one of our villages want to celebrate a successful year and intend to invite their Native neighbours as well. They ask for our permission for the celebration, and if we want to sponsor the event.
TEXT.French: Les colons de l'un de nos villages ont célébré une année riche en succès et tiennent à inviter leur voisins indigènes. Ils demandent la permission pour cette célébration et nous demande notre concours financier.
TEXT.German: Die Siedler einer unserer Städte wollen ein erfolgreiches letztes Jahr feiern und auch ihre Nachbarn aus den nahegelegenene Ureinwohnerdörfern einladen. Sie bitten untertänigst um unsere Erlaubnis für dieses Fest und fragen, ob wir das Ereignis vielleicht sponsoren wollen.
TEXT.Italian: The settlers from one of our villages want to celebrate a successful last year and intend to invite their Native neighbours as well. They ask for our permission for that celebration and if we want to sponsor the event.
TEXT.Spanish: The settlers from one of our villages want to celebrate a successful last year and intend to invite their Native neighbours as well. They ask for our permission for that celebration and if we might sponsor the event.

TEXT.English: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Hallowe'en in the New World.
TEXT.French: Les colons européens de %s2_city ont célébré leur première fête d'Halloween dans le Nouveau Monde.
TEXT.German: Europäische Kolonisten in %s2_city haben das erste Halloween in der neuen Welt gefeiert.
TEXT.Italian: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Halloween in the New World.
TEXT.Spanish: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Halloween in the New World.

TEXT.English: Some settlers that have recently arrived from Ireland and other European countries want to celebrate what they call 'Hallowe'en'. It sounds like quite a wild event, almost heretical.
TEXT.French: Des colons récemment arrivés d'Irlande et d'autres pays européens veulent célébrer ce qu'ils appellent « Halloween ». Cela semble être une célébration assez païenne, sinon clairement hérétique.
TEXT.German: Einige Siedler, die erst kürzlich aus Irland und anderen europäischen Ländern angekommen sind, wollen ein Fest feiern, welches sie 'Halloween' nennen. Das Fest hört sich etwas supekt an.
TEXT.Italian: Some settlers that have recently arrived from Ireland and other European countries want to celebrate what they call 'Halloween'. It does sound like a quite wild event, almost heretical.
TEXT.Spanish: Some settlers that have recently arrived from Ireland and other European countries want to celebrate what they call 'Halloween'. It does sound like a quite wild event, almost heretical.

TEXT.English: Missionary accused of sexually molesting Native women.
TEXT.French: Des missionnaires sont accusés d'avoir abusés de femmes indigènes.
TEXT.German: Ein Missionar wurde beschuldigt Ureinwohnerinnen sexuell zu belästigen.
TEXT.Italian: Missionary accused of sexually molesting Native women.
TEXT.Spanish: Missionary accused of sexually molesting Native women.

TEXT.English: Some Natives from a nearby village have arrived in one of our cities. They have a Missionary with them, with his hands tied, and they accuse him of having sexually molested their women.
TEXT.French: Des indigènes d'un village voisin sont venus dans l'une de nos villes. Ils avaient un missionnaire avec eux auxquels ils ont liés les mains. Ils l'accusent d'avoir abusé sexuellement de leurs femmes.
TEXT.German: Einige Wilde aus einer nahegelegenen Siedlung sind in einer unserer Städte angekommen. Sie haben einen gefesselten Missionar bei sich und beschuldigen diesen, dass er ihre Frauen sexuell belästigt habe.
TEXT.Italian: Some Natives from a nearby village have arrived in one of our cities. They have a Missionary with them, who has been tied at his hands, and they accuse him of having sexually molested their women.
TEXT.Spanish: Some Natives from a nearby village have arrived in one of our cities. They have a Missionary with them, who has been tied at his hands, and they accuse him of having sexually molested their women.

TEXT.English: A deserted wolf cub has been found in the wilderness.
TEXT.French: Un louveteau abandonné a été trouvé dans le désert.
TEXT.German: Ein verlassener Wolfswelpe wurde in der Wildnis gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: A deserted wolf whelp has been found in the wilderness.
TEXT.Spanish: A deserted wolf whelp has been found in the wilderness.

TEXT.English: Our men have found a deserted wolf cub in the wilderness. His mother is probably dead. Perhaps this young beast could be tamed or else sold to some crazy rich man.
TEXT.French: Nos hommes ont trouvé un louveteau abandonné dans le désert. Sa mère est probablement morte. Cette jeune bête peut sans doute être dompté ou même vendu à un home riche qui s'ennuie.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer Männer hat einen verlassenen Wolfswelpen in der Wildnis gefunden. Seine Mutter ist wahrscheinlich tot. Vielleicht kann das kleine Biest ja gezähmt werden. Oder wir verkaufen es einem Reichen, der gelangweilt genug ist.
TEXT.Italian: Our men have found a deserted wolf whelp in the wilderness. His mother is probably dead. Eventually this young beast can be tamed or it could be sold to some crazy and bored rich man.
TEXT.Spanish: Our men have found a deserted wolf whelp in the wilderness. His mother is probably dead. Eventually this young beast can be tamed or it could be sold to some crazy and bored rich man.

TEXT.English: Some left-over construction materials from a former colony have been found.
TEXT.French: Certains matériaux de construction délaissés à l'époque de la fondation de la colonie ont été retrouvés.
TEXT.German: Einige übriggelassene Baumaterialien von der Gründung einer Kolonie wurden entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: Some left over construction materials from foundation of a colony were found.
TEXT.Spanish: Some left over construction materials from foundation of a colony were found.

TEXT.English: Colonists at a recently founded city have materials left over from its construction. Some citizens want to use those for constructing a chapel. Others want to build a tavern. Whatever we will decide, one party will be unhappy.
TEXT.French: Certains colons ont récemment découvert des matériaux de construction délaissés lors de la fondation de leur colonoe. Certains d'entre eux souhaitent l'utiliser pour construire une chapelle, d'autres pour construire une taverne. Quelque soit la décision, l'un des deux camps ne sera pas satisfait.
TEXT.German: Einige Kolonisten einer kürzlich gegründeten Stadt haben entdeckt, dass noch einige Baumaterialien übrig geblieben sind. Einige Bewohner wollen mit diesen Baumaterialien eine Kapelle errichten. Andere Bewohner wollen stattdessen eine Taverne bauen. Wie auch immer wir uns entscheiden, eine Seite wird unzufrieden sein.
TEXT.Italian: Some colonists of a recently founded city discovered that some materials were left over from its foundation. Some citizens want to use those for constructing a chapel. Other citizens want to build a tavern. Whatever we will decide, one party will be unhappy.
TEXT.Spanish: Some colonists of a recently founded city discovered that some materials were left over from its foundation. Some citizens want to use those for constructing a chapel. Other citizens want to build a tavern. Whatever we will decide, one party will be unhappy.

TEXT.English: A local farmer has gone bankrupt.
TEXT.French: Un fermier d'une de nos colonies a fait faillite.
TEXT.German: Ein Farmer aus der Gegend ist bankrott gegangen.
TEXT.Italian: A local farmer has gone bankrupt.
TEXT.Spanish: A local farmer has gone bankrupt.

TEXT.English: A recently immigrated farmer took a big loan to buy land but now he cannot pay. He wants to sell everything he has to repay the loan and go back to Europe.
TEXT.French: Un fermier ayant récemment immigré s'est lourdement endetté pour acheter des terres qu'il ne peut plus rembourser. Il veut tout ce qui lui reste pour clore ses dettes et rentrer en Europe.
TEXT.German: Ein kürzlich eingewanderter Farmer hat einen hohen Kredit aufgenommen um sich etwas Land zu kaufen. Diesen kann er nun nicht mehr zurückzahlen. Daher will er sein gesamtes Habe verkaufen um damit den Kredit zu begleichen und wieder nach Europa heimzukehren.
TEXT.Italian: A recently immigrated farmer took a high credit to buy some land which he now cannot pay anymore. He wants to sell everything he has to be able to repay the credit and go back to Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: A recently immigrated farmer took a high credit to buy some land which he now cannot pay anymore. He wants to sell everything he has to be able to repay the credit and go back to Europe.

TEXT.English: A large-scale military conflict in Europe has ended.
TEXT.French: Un conflit militaire d'importance a pris fin en Europe.
TEXT.German: Ein bedeutender militärischer Konflikt wurde in Europa beendet.
TEXT.Italian: A large scale military conflict in Europe has ended.
TEXT.Spanish: A large scale military conflict in Europe has ended.

TEXT.English: A large-scale military conflict in Europe has ended. Many troops are not needed any more and have been sent home. Maybe we could hire some of them.
TEXT.French: Un conflit militaire d'importance a pris fin en Europe. De nombreuses troupes n'y sont plus nécessaires et ont été renvoyés à leur maison. Peut-être pourrions-nous en engager quelques-unes.
TEXT.German: Ein bedeutender militärischer Konflikt wurde in Europa beendet. Viele Truppen werden wieder entlassen. Vielleicht können wir einige davon anheuern.
TEXT.Italian: A large scale military conflict in Europe has ended. Many troops are not needed anymore and have been sent home again. Maybe we could hire some of them.
TEXT.Spanish: A large scale military conflict in Europe has ended. Many troops are not needed anymore and have been sent home again. Maybe we could hire some of them.

TEXT.English: A drunken fisher died in a storm.
TEXT.French: Un pêcheur alcoolisé est moort dans une tempête.
TEXT.German: Ein betrunkener Fischer starb in einem Sturm.
TEXT.Italian: A drunken fisher died in a storm.
TEXT.Spanish: A drunken fisher died in a storm.

TEXT.English: A drunken fisher fell over board during a storm and drowned. His widow now wants to sell his fishing boat, since she has no use for it.
TEXT.French: Un pêcheur alcoolisé est passé par dessus bord lors d'une tempête. Il s'est noyé. Sa veuve souhaite vendre son bâteau de pêche, n'en ayant plus d'usage.
TEXT.German: Ein betrunkener Fischer fiel während eines Sturms über Bord und ertrank. Seine Witwe möchte nun dessen Fischerboot verkaufen, da sie keine Verwendung dafür hat.
TEXT.Italian: A drunken fisher fell over board during a storm and drowned. His widow now wants to sell his fishing boat, since she has no usage for it.
TEXT.Spanish: A drunken fisher fell over board during a storm and drowned. His widow now wants to sell his fishing boat, since she has no usage for it.

TEXT.English: A Butcher has fled Europe because he was accused of selling rotten meat.
TEXT.French: Un boûcher venu d'Europe est accusé d'être en fuite après avoir vendu de la viande pourrie.
TEXT.German: Ein Schlachtermeister ist aus Europa geflohen, weil er verdorbenes Fleisch verkauft haben soll.
TEXT.Italian: A Butcher has fled Europe because he was accused of selling rotten meat.
TEXT.Spanish: A Butcher has fled Europe because he was accused of selling rotten meat.

TEXT.English: A Butcher has arrived in the harbour of one of our cities. He had to flee Europe because he was accused of selling rotten meat. He pleads that he is innocent and wants us to give him a second chance.
TEXT.French: Un ancien boûcher est arrivé au port de l'une de nos villes. Il a fui d'Europe parce qu'il était accusé d'avoir vendu de la viande pourrie. Il clâme son innocence et souhaite qu'on lui laisse une deuxième chance.
TEXT.German: Ein Schlachtermeister ist im Hafen einer unserer Städte eingetroffen. Er musste aus Europa fliehen, weil er verdorbenes Fleisch verkauft haben soll. Er behauptet aber unschuldig zu sein und bittet um eine zweite Chance.
TEXT.Italian: A former Butcher has arrived in the harbor of one of our cities. He had to flee Europe because he was accused of selling rotten meat. He pleads that he is innocent and wants us to give him a second chance.
TEXT.Spanish: A former Butcher has arrived in the harbor of one of our cities. He had to flee Europe because he was accused of selling rotten meat. He pleads that he is innocent and wants us to give him a second chance.

TEXT.English: Some desperate Conquistadores have raided a Native settlement.
TEXT.French: Des conquistadors désespérés ont pillé un village indigène.
TEXT.German: Einige verzweifelte Conquistadores haben ein Ureinwohnerdorf überfallen.
TEXT.Italian: Some Desperate Conquistadores have raided a Native settlement.
TEXT.Spanish: Some Desperate Conquistadores have raided a Native settlement.

TEXT.English: Some Mounted Conquistadores arrived in one of our settlements in pretty bad shape. Some are wounded. Soon after Natives from a nearby tribe arrived and accused those same Conquistadores of raiding their villages.
TEXT.French: Des conquistadors à cheval sont arrivés dans l'une de nos villes dans un bien triste état. Ils comptent plusieurs blessés. Peu de temps après, des indigènes d'une tribu voisine sont également arrivés et ont accusé les conquistadors d'avoir réalisé un raide dans leurs villages.
TEXT.German: Einige berittene Conquistadores in sehr schlechtem Zustand sind in einer unserer Siedlungen angekommen. Einige von ihnen sind verwundet. Kurz darauf trafen auch einige Ureinwohner eines nahegelegenen Stammes ein und beschuldigten die Conquistadores ihre Dörfer überfallen zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: Some Mounted Conquistadores in pretty bad shape arrived in on of our settlements. Some of them are wounded. Shortly later some Natives of a nearby tribe arrived as well and accused those Conquistadores of having raided their villages.
TEXT.Spanish: Some Mounted Conquistadores in pretty bad shape arrived in on of our settlements. Some of them are wounded. Shortly later some Natives of a nearby tribe arrived as well and accused those Conquistadores of having raided their villages.

TEXT.English: Trouble between trappers and Natives over hunting rights.
TEXT.French: Des tensions montent entre trappeurs et indigènes à propos de droits de chasse.
TEXT.German: Konflikte zwischen Trappern und Ureinwohnern über Jagdrechte.
TEXT.Italian: Trouble between trappers and Natives over hunting rights.
TEXT.Spanish: Trouble between trappers and Natives over hunting rights.

TEXT.English: Close to one of our forts, our troops heard shots in the woods. When they went out of the fort to investigate, they walked into an argument between Natives and Trappers about hunting rights. The Natives claim that those forests still belong to them and that no white man is allowed to hunt there.
TEXT.French: À proximité de l'un de nos forts, nos troupes ont entendu des tirs dans les bois. En menant l'investigation, ils se sont confrontés à une querelle entre des trappeurs et des indigènes à propos de droits de chasse. Les indigènes considèrent que cette forêt leur appartient et que les blancs n'y sont pas autorisés à chasser.
TEXT.German: In der Nähe eines unserer Forts haben die Truppen Schüsse in den Wäldern gehört. Als sie diese untersuchten, fanden sie Ureinwohner und Trapper in eine Streit über Jagdrechte in den umliegenden Wäldern. Die Ureinwohner behaupten, dass das Land immer noch ihnen gehört und dass dort kein weisser Mann ohne ihre Erlaubnis jagen darf.
TEXT.Italian: Close to one of our forts, our troops heard shots in the woods. When they went out of the fort to investigate, they stumbled into an argument between Natives and Trappers about hunting rights in the nearby forests. The Natives claim that those forests still belong to them and that no white man is allowed to be hunting in them.
TEXT.Spanish: Close to one of our Forts, our troops heard shots in the woods. When they went out of the fort to investigate, they stumbled into an argument between Natives and Trappers about hunting rights in the nearby forests. The Natives claim that those forests still belong to them and that no white man is allowed to be hunting in them.

TEXT.English: Cutthroats are roaming the woods.
TEXT.French: Des truands occupent les bois.
TEXT.German: Halsabschneider machen die Wälder unsicher.
TEXT.Italian: Cutthroats are roaming the woods.
TEXT.Spanish: Cutthroats are roaming the woods.

TEXT.English: We have heard reports that some cutthroats are roaming the woods. Luckily one of our forts is nearby and could send troops to intervene.
TEXT.French: Selon plusieurs rapports, des truands occupent les bois. Heureusement nous disposons d'un fort à proximité et nous pouvons faire intervenir des troupes.
TEXT.German: In der Nähe eines unserer Forts scheinen sich einige Halsabschneider in den Wäldern zu verstecken. Sollen unsere Truppen eingreifen ?.
TEXT.Italian: We have heard reports that some cutthroats are roaming the woods. Luckily one of our forts is nearby and could send troops to intervene.
TEXT.Spanish: We have heard reports that some cutthroats are roaming the woods. Luckily one of our forts is nearby and could send troops to intervene.

TEXT.English: Men from the wilderness buy supplies in the forts.
TEXT.French: Des hommes dans les terres sauvages s'approvisionnent dans les forts.
TEXT.German: Männer in der Wildniss nutzen die Forts um Vorräte zu kaufen.
TEXT.Italian: Men from the wilderness buy supplies in the forts.
TEXT.Spanish: Men from the wilderness buy supplies in the forts.

TEXT.English: Some men living in the nearby wilderness have come to one of our forts to buy supplies. They have gathered a lot of knowledge of the area and could be very useful to us.
TEXT.French: Des hommes vivant dans les terres sauvages sont venu pour s'approvisionner dans nos forts. Ils semblent bien connaître les environs et pourraient nous être utiles.
TEXT.German: Einige Männer, die in der nahegelegenen Wildniss leben, sind in unser Fort gekommen um Vorräte zu kaufen. Es scheint als hätten sie sehr viel Wissen über die Gegend. Daher könnten sie uns sehr nützlich sein.
TEXT.Italian: Some men living in the nearby wilderness have come to one of our forts to buy supplies. They seem to have gathered a lot of knowledge of the area and could be very useful to us.
TEXT.Spanish: Some men living in the nearby wilderness have come to one of our forts to buy supplies. They seem to have gathered a lot of knowledge of the area and could be very useful to us.

TEXT.English: After a long, hard winter, Natives have come to a Monastery to buy food.
TEXT.French: Après un hiver long et vigoureux, des indigènes sont venues au Monastère pour acheter de la nourriture.
TEXT.German: Nach einem langen harten Winter kamen Ureinwohner in ein Kloster um Nahrung zu kaufen.
TEXT.Italian: After a long, hard winter, Natives have come to a Monastery to buy some food.
TEXT.Spanish: After a long, hard winter, Natives have come to a Monastery to buy some food.

TEXT.English: After a long, hard winter, Natives from a nearby village have come to one of our Monasteries to buy food. They do not have much to offer in exchange.
TEXT.French: Après un hiver long et vigoureux, des indigènes sont venues au Monastère pour acheter de la nourriture. Ils n'ont pas grand-chose à offrir en échange.
TEXT.German: Nach einem langen harten Winter kamen Ureinwohner aus einem benachbarten Dorf in eines unserer Kloster um Nahrung zu kaufen. Sie haben aber im Austausch wenig anzubieten.
TEXT.Italian: After a long, hard winter, Natives from a nearby village have come to one of our Monasteries to buy some food. They do not have much to offer in exchange.
TEXT.Spanish: After a long, hard winter, Natives from a nearby village have come to one of our Monasteries to buy some food. They do not have much to offer in exchange.

TEXT.English: Some Native slaves escaped the white man and seek protection in Monasteries.
TEXT.French: Des esclaves indigènes se sont enfuis et cherchent la protection dans nos monastères.
TEXT.German: Einige Ureinwohnersklaven entfliehen der Gefangenschaft des Weissen Mannes und suche Schutz in Klöstern.
TEXT.Italian: Some Native slaves escaped the white man and seek protection in Monasteries.
TEXT.Spanish: Some Native slaves escaped the white man and seek protection in Monasteries.

TEXT.English: Some Native slaves escaped from one of our European neighbours and seek protection in one of our Monasteries. Troops from our European neighbour have surrounded the Monastery and demand that their property is returned to them.
TEXT.French: Des esclaves indigènes se sont enfuis de chez l'un de nos voisins européens et cherchent la protection de l'un de nos monastères. Des troupes des colons européens voisins encerclent le monastère et demandent que leur propriété leur soit rendu.
TEXT.German: Einige Ureinwohnersklaven konnten der Gefangenschaft eines unserer europäischen Nachbarn entfliehen und suchen nun Schutz in einem unserer Klöstern. Truppen unseres Nachbarn haben aber bereits das Kloster umstellt und verlangen die Herausgabe der Sklaven.
TEXT.Italian: Some Native slaves escaped from one of our European neighbours and seek protection in one of our Monasteries. Troops of our European neighbour have surrounded the Monastery and demand that their property is returned to them.
TEXT.Spanish: Some Native slaves escaped from one of our European neighbours and seek protection in one of our Monasteries. Troops of our European neighbour have surrounded the Monastery and demand that their property is returned to them.

TEXT.English: Natives brought a wounded warrior to a Monastery.
TEXT.French: Des indigènes ont apporté un guerrier blessé dans un monastère.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner brachten Verwundeten in ein Kloster.
TEXT.Italian: Natives brought a wounded warrior to a Monastery.
TEXT.Spanish: Natives brought a wounded warrior to a Monastery.

TEXT.English: Some Natives from a nearby village brought a badly wounded young warrior to one of our Monasteries. He was attacked by a bear. If we do not help him, he will surely die.
TEXT.French: Des indigènes d'un village avoisinant ont ramené un jeune guerrier sérieusement blessé dans l'un de nos monastères. Il semble avoir été attaqué par un ours. Si nous ne l'aidons pas, il va probablement mourrir.
TEXT.German: Einige Ureinwohner eines nahegelegen Dorfes haben einen schwer verwundeten jungen Krieger in eines unserer Klöster gebracht. Er scheint vom einem Bären angegriffen worden zu sein. Wenn wir nicht helfen, wird er sterben.
TEXT.Italian: Some Native from a nearby village brought a heavily wounded young warrior to one of our Monasteries. It seems like he was attacked by a bear. If we do not help him, he will surely die.
TEXT.Spanish: Some Native from a nearby village brought a heavily wounded young warrior to one of our Monasteries. It seems like he was attacked by a bear. If we do not help him, he will surely die.

TEXT.English: The first university has been founded in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: La première université a été fondée à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Die erste Universität der Neuen Welt wurde in %s2_city gegründet.
TEXT.Italian: The first university has been founded in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: The first university has been founded in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: An influential society of educated men in our mother country heard about the foundation of our first University. They want to help us by sending a highly educated man to work as a professor.
TEXT.French: Une société influente d'hommes éduqués dans notre mère patrie ont entendu parlé de la fondation de notre première université. Ils souhaitent nous aider en nous envoyer un de leur sage pour y enseigner.
TEXT.German: Eine einflussreiche Gesellschaft gebildeter Männer unseres Heimatlandes hat von der Gründung unserer ersten Universität erfahren. Sie wollen uns helfen, indem sie uns einen hoch gebildeten Mann schicken wollen, der unsere Studenten unterrichtet.
TEXT.Italian: A influential society of educated men in our mother country heard about the foundation of our first Universtiy. They want to help us by sending a highly educated man to work as a professor.
TEXT.Spanish: A influential society of educated men in our mother country heard about the foundation of our first Universtiy. They want to help us by sending a highly educated man to work as a professor.

TEXT.English: Large schools of cod in the oceans.
TEXT.French: Des bancs massifs de cabillauds dans les océans.
TEXT.German: Riesige Kabeljauschwärme in den Ozeanen.
TEXT.Italian: Large swarms of cod in the oceans.
TEXT.Spanish: Large swarms of cod in the oceans.

TEXT.English: One of our fishing boats has sighted a large school of young cod. If we harvest those fish now, the cod will probably not recover.
TEXT.French: L'un de nos bateaux de pêche a repéré de larges bancs de jeunes cabillauds. Si nous les pêchons tous d'un seul coup, il ne pourra probablement pas se reproduire.
TEXT.German: Eines unserer Fischerboote hat einen riesigen Schwarm junger Kabeljaufische entdeckt. Wenn wir ihn jedoch jetzt bereits abfischen, wird es sich nicht davon erholen.
TEXT.Italian: One of our fishing boats has sighted a large swarm of young cod. If we harvest those fish now, the swarm will probably not recover.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our fishing boats has sighted a large swarm of young cod. If we harvest those fish now, the swarm will probably not recover.

TEXT.English: An influential trading company wants to expand its business in the New World. It offers a reward to the first colony to build 5 cities with harbours.
TEXT.French: Une grande compagnie financière souhaite développer ses activités dans le Nouveau Monde. Elle offre une récompense à la première colonie qui construira 5 villes disposant de docks ou de meilleurs ports.
TEXT.German: Eine einflussreiche Handelsgesellschaft will ihre Unternehmungen in der Neuen Welt ausweiten. Sie bietet daher der ersten Kolonie, die 5 Städte mit einfachen oder ausgebauten Häfen errichtet, eine Belohnung an.
TEXT.Italian: An influential trading company wants to expand its business in the New World. It offers a reward to the first colony to build 5 cities with Docks or even better harbours.
TEXT.Spanish: An influential trading company wants to expand its business in the New World. It offers a reward to the first colony to build 5 cities with Docks or even better harbours.

TEXT.English: Another colony has built harbours in 5 cities before you. They are now granted support from an influential trading company.
TEXT.French: Une autre puissance a construit 5 ports avant vous. Ils ont obtenu le soutien de la compagnie financière influente.
TEXT.German: Eine andere Kolonie konnte vor euch in 5 Städten Häfen errichten. Sie werden daher nun von einer einflussreiche Handelsgesellschaft unterstützt.
TEXT.Italian: Another colony has built harbours in 5 cities before you. They are now granted support from an influential trading company.
TEXT.Spanish: Another colony has built harbours in 5 cities before you. They are now granted support from an influential trading company.

TEXT.English: A colonial power has built harbours in 5 cities before any other colony could.
TEXT.French: Une colonie a été la première a construire 5 ports avant les autres.
TEXT.German: Eine Kolonialmacht konnte vor allen anderen in 5 Städten Häfen errichten.
TEXT.Italian: A colonial power hasbuilt harbours in 5 cities before any other colony could.
TEXT.Spanish: A colonial power hasbuilt harbours in 5 cities before any other colony could.

TEXT.English: You have built harbours in 5 cities before any other colony could. You are now granted support from an influential trading company. Choose your reward.
TEXT.French: Vous avez été le première à construire 5 ports dans vos colonies. Vous avez obtenu le soutien d'une grande compagnie financière. Choisissez votre récompense.
TEXT.German: Eure Kolonie konnte vor allen anderen in 5 Städten Häfen errichten. Ihr werdet daher nun von einer einflussreiche Handelsgesellschaft unterstützt. Wählt eure Belohnung.
TEXT.Italian: You have built harbours in 5 cities before any other colony could. You are now granted support from an influential trading company. Choose your reward.
TEXT.Spanish: You have built harbours in 5 cities before any other colony could. You are now granted support from an influential trading company. Choose your reward.

TEXT.English: A group of private traders in our colony insists that we must create more markets. They even offer us a reward, if we are the first colony to have 5 cities with markets.
TEXT.French: Des négociants privés dans nos colonies nous demandent d'investir dans davantage de marchés. Ils nous proposent même une récompense si nous devenons la première puissance coloniale à construire 5 marchés.
TEXT.German: Eine einflussreiche Gruppe von Händler aus unseren Städten fordert, dass wir mehr Märkte in den Kolonien bauen. Sie bietet als Anreiz sogar eine Belohnung, falls wir als erste erste Kolonie in 5 Städten Märkte errichtet haben.
TEXT.Italian: A group of private traders in our colony demands that we invest into more markets in the colonies. They even offer a reward to us, if we are the first colony to have 5 cities with markets.
TEXT.Spanish: A group of private traders in our colony demands that we invest into more markets in the colonies. They even offer a reward to us, if we are the first colony to have 5 cities with markets.

TEXT.English: Another colony has built markets in 5 cities before you. You have lost the chance to get the reward from our private traders.
TEXT.French: Une autre colonie a construit 5 marchés dans ses villes avant nous. Vous avez perdu votre chance de gagner une récompense de la part des négociants privés.
TEXT.German: Eine andere Kolonie konnte vor euch in 5 Städten Märkte errichten. Dadurch habt ihr die Chance auf eine Belohung durch unsere eigenen Händler vertan.
TEXT.Italian: Another colony has built markets in 5 cities before you. You have lost the chance to win the reward of our private traders.
TEXT.Spanish: Another colony has built markets in 5 cities before you. You have lost the chance to win the reward of our private traders.

TEXT.English: A colonial power has built markets in 5 cities before all other colonies could.
TEXT.French: Une puissance coloniale a été la première à construire des marchés dans 5 villes.
TEXT.German: Eine Kolonialmacht konnte vor allen anderen in 5 Städten Märkte errichten.
TEXT.Italian: A colonial power has built markets in 5 cities before all other colonies could.
TEXT.Spanish: A colonial power has built markets in 5 cities before all other colonies could.

TEXT.English: You have built markets in 5 cities before all other colonies could. The group of private traders now asks which reward they should offer.
TEXT.French: Vous avez été le premier à construire 5 marchés dans vos villes. Les négociants privés vous proposent de choisir votre récompense.
TEXT.German: Eure Kolonie konnte vor allen anderen in 5 Städten Märkte errichten. Die Händler aus unseren Städten fragen nun, welche Belohnung ihr dafür wollt.
TEXT.Italian: You have built markets in 5 cities before all other colonies could. The group of private traders now asks which reward they could offer.
TEXT.Spanish: You have built markets in 5 cities before all other colonies could. The group of private traders now asks which reward they could offer.

TEXT.English: A corn chamber in %s2_city caught fire.
TEXT.French: Un grenier à maïs à %s2_city a pris feu.
TEXT.German: Eine Getreidekammer in %s2_city hat Feuer gefangen.
TEXT.Italian: A corn chamber in %s2_city caught fire.
TEXT.Spanish: A corn chamber in %s2_city caught fire.

TEXT.English: A corn chamber in %s2_city caught fire. Although the fire was extinguished and most of the corn saved, the building is heavily damaged and will need to be repaired or it will crumble.
TEXT.French: Un grenier à maïs a pris feu à %s2_city. Même si le feu a pu être éteint, la récolte de grain n'a pas pu être sauvée, le bâtiment est très endommagé et a besoin de réparation pour ne pas s'écrouler.
TEXT.German: Eine Getreidekammer in %s2_city hat Feuer gefangen. Obwohl das Feuer glöscht werden konnten und das meiste Getreide gerettet wurde, muss das Gebäude wieder repariert werden, oder es wird zusammenfallen.
TEXT.Italian: A corn chamber in %s2_city caught fire. Although the fire could be extinguished and and most of the corn itself could be saved, the building is heavily damaged and will need to be repaired or it will crumble.
TEXT.Spanish: A corn chamber in %s2_city caught fire. Although the fire could be extinguished and and most of the corn could be saved, the building is heavily damaged and will need to be repaired or it will crumble.

TEXT.English: The water of a well in %s2_city was contaminated with the corpse of a dead animal.
TEXT.French: L'eau d'un puit à %s2_city a été contaminé par le corps d'un animal mort.
TEXT.German: Das Wasser eines Brunnens in %s2_city wurde durch ein totes Tier verseucht.
TEXT.Italian: The water of a well in %s2_city was contaminated with the corpse of a dead animal.
TEXT.Spanish: The water of a well in %s2_city was contaminated with the corpse of a dead animal.

TEXT.English: An animal fell into one of our wells in %s2_city and drowned. Now the corpse has contaminated the water. We will need to seal the well and dig a new one.
TEXT.French: Un animal est tombé dans un de nos puits à %s2_city et s'y est noyé. Le corps a contaminé l'eau. Nous devons condamner le puit et en construire un nouveau.
TEXT.German: Ein Tier ist in einen unserer Brunnen in %s2_city gefallen und ertrunken. Nun hat dessen Körper das Wasser verseucht. Wir werden den Brunnen versiegeln und einen neuen Brunnen graben müssen.
TEXT.Italian: An animal fell into one of our wells in %s2_city and drowned. Now the corpse has contaminated the water. We will need to seal the well and dig a new one.
TEXT.Spanish: An animal fell into one of our wells in %s2_city and drowned. Now the corpse has contaminated the water. We will need to seal the well and dig a new one.

TEXT.English: Natives are concealing a gem deposit.
TEXT.French: Des indigènes cachent une mine de diamant.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner verstecken ein Edelsteinvorkommen.
TEXT.Italian: Natives are hiding a gem mine.
TEXT.Spanish: Natives are hiding a gem mine.

TEXT.English: Our men noticed that some of the Natives that visit their city wear necklaces with beautiful stones. They're valuable gems. When asked about those stones, they say that they're sacred but will not say where they found them.
TEXT.French: Nos hommes ont reperé des indigènes lors d'une de leur visite avec de magnifiques colliers de pierres précieuses. Ils croient qu'il s'agit de diamants. Quand la question leur a été posée, ils ont répondu qu'il s'agissait de pierres sacrées et n'ont pas voulu nous dire où ils les ont trouvés.
TEXT.German: Unsere Männer haben festgestellt, dass einige Ureinwohner die ihre Stadt besuchen Halsketten mit wunderschönen Steinen tragen. Diese scheinen wertvolle Edelsteine zu sein. Nach deren Herkunft befragt, reagierten die Ureinwohner ausweichend und sagten nur, dass diese ihnen heilig seien.
TEXT.Italian: Our men noticed that some of the Natives that visit their city wear necklaces with beautiful looking stones. They seem to be valuable gems. When asked about those stones, they told us that they were sacred to them but did not want to say where they found them.
TEXT.Spanish: Our men noticed that some of the Natives that visit their city wear necklaces with beautiful looking stones. They seem to be valuable gems. When asked about those stones, they told us that they were sacred to them but did not want to say where they found them.

TEXT.English: Many barrels of beer have been stolen from the warehouse in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Plusieurs tonneaux de bière ont été volés dans l'entrepôt de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Aus dem Warenhaus in %s2_city wurde Bier gestohlen.
TEXT.Italian: Many barrels of beer have been stolen from the warehouse in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Many barrels of beer have been stolen from the warehouse in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A warehouse in %s2_city has been robbed. Cutthroats from our %s1_civ neighbours in %s6_city are suspected of looting a cartload of beer.
TEXT.French: Des hommes sont entrés dans l'entrepôt de %s2_city par effraction. Des brigands provenant de chez nos voisins %s1_civ à %s6_city sont suspectés d'avoir pillés nos tonneaux de bières.
TEXT.German: Ein Lagerhaus in %s2_city wurde aufgebrochen und ausgeraubt. Es werden Diebe von %s1_civ Nachbarn in %s6_city verdächtigt, den Überfall begangen und eine Ladung Beer geraubt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: A warehouse in %s2_city has been roobed. Cutthroats from our %s1_civ neighbours in %s6_city are suspected of looting a cartload of beer.
TEXT.Spanish: A warehouse in %s2_city has been roobed. Cutthroats from our %s1_civ neighbours in %s6_city are suspected of looting a cartload of beer.

TEXT.English: Some barrels of wine have been stolen from the warehouse in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Plusieurs tonneaux de vin ont été volés dans l'entrepôt de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Aus dem Warenhaus in %s2_city wurde Wein gestohlen.
TEXT.Italian: Some barrels of wine have been stolen from the warehouse in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Some barrels of wine have been stolen from the warehouse in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A warehouse in %s2_city has been robbed. Several barrels of wine are missing. Some young hotspurs of the city are suspected of being behind all this. The citizens see this affair as a funny prank.
TEXT.French: Des hommes sont entrés dans l'entrepôt de %s2_city par effraction. Plusieurs tonneaux de bières sont manquants. Des jeunes délinquants de la ville sont suspectés d'être à l'origine du délit. Les citoyens voit cette affaire comme une farce amusante.
TEXT.German: Ein Lagerhaus in %s2_city wurde aufgebrochen und einige Fässer Wein geraubt. Es werden es werden junge Männer aus der Stadt selbst verdächtigt. Die Bürger sehen darin einen lustigen Streich.
TEXT.Italian: A warehouse in %s2_city has been robbed. Several barrels of wine are missing. Some young hotspurs of the city are suspected of being behind all this. The citizens see this affair as a funny prank.
TEXT.Spanish: A warehouse in %s2_city has been robbed. Several barrels of wine are missing. Some young hotspurs of the city are suspected of being behind all this. The citizens see this affair as a funny prank.

TEXT.English: Social unrest in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Révolte sociale à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Aus dem Warenhaus in %s2_city wurde Wein gestohlen.
TEXT.Italian: Social unrest in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Social unrest in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: There is social unrest in %s2_city. The poorer people have joined with drunks and troublemakers and are marching towards one of our warehouses storing luxury goods. It looks like they're ready to raid it.
TEXT.French: Il y a une révolte sociale à %s2_city. Des pauvres, des alcooliques et des perturbateurs se sont regroupés et marchent en direction de l'un de nos entrepôts qui contient des denrées précieuses. Ils semblent vouloir le piller.
TEXT.German: Es herrschen soziale Unruhen in %s2_city. Die Armen haben sich mit Betrunken und Raufbolden zusammengetan und marschieren auf eines unserer Warenhäuser, dasss Luxuswaren beinhalten. Es scheint als würden sie dieses plündern wollen.
TEXT.Italian: There is social unrest in %s2_city. The poorer people have joined with drunks and troublemakers and are marching towards one of our warehouses with luxury goods. It seems as if they are about to raid it.
TEXT.Spanish: There is social unrest in %s2_city. The poorer people have joined with drunks and troublemakers and are marching towards one of our warehouses with luxury goods. It seems as if they are about to raid it.

TEXT.English: Conflict between cowboys and shepherds in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Contflit entre des éleveurs et des bergers à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Streit zwischen Rinderzüchtern und Schafzüchtern in %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: Conflict between cowboys and shepherds in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Conflict between cowboys and shepherds in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A serious conflict between cowboys and shepherds has arisen in %s2_city. Each side claims that the other side has too many animals which destroy pastures and water holes.
TEXT.French: Un conflit sérieux entre des cowboys et des bergers a éclaté à %s2_city. Les deux camps considèrent que l'autre élève trop d'animaux et leur limite leur zone de pâturage.
TEXT.German: Ein ernsthaftern Konflikt zwischen Rinderzüchtern und Schafzüchtern in %s2_city keimt auf. Jede Seite behauptet, dass die andere die Weiden überweidet und die Wasserstellen verschmutzt.
TEXT.Italian: A serious conflict between cowboys and shepherds has arisen in %s2_city. Each side claims that the other side has too much animals and is destroying pastures and watering places.
TEXT.Spanish: A serious conflict between cowboys and shepherds has arisen in %s2_city. Each side claims that the other side has too much animals and is destroying pastures and watering places.

TEXT.English: Many horses are bred in the region around %s2_city.
TEXT.French: De nombreux chevaux sont élevés dans la région autour de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Viele Pferde werden in der Gegend um %s2_city gezüchtet.
TEXT.Italian: Many horses are bred in the region around %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Many horses are bred in the region around %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A newly arrived immigrant has bought some land several miles away from %s2_city. He is dreaming of becoming a rancher and breeding horses. However he does not have enough money left to buy the livestock needed.
TEXT.French: Un immigrant nouvellement arrivé a acheté des terres aux alentours de %s2_city. Il rêve de devenir un propriétaire de ranch et d'élever des chevaux. Cependant il ne lui reste plus beaucoup d'argent pour acheter les animaux nécessaires.
TEXT.German: Ein kürzlich eingetroffener Immigrant hat sich etwas Land einige Meilen von %s2_city entfernt gekauft. Er träumt davon ein Rancher zu werden und Pferde zu züchten. Er hat jedoch kaum noch Geld übrig um sich die Pferde zu kaufen.
TEXT.Italian: A newly arrived immigrant has bought some land several miles away from %s2_city. He is dreaming of becoming a rancher and breeding horses. However he does not have much money left to buy the livestock needed.
TEXT.Spanish: A newly arrived immigrant has bought some land several miles away from %s2_city. He is dreaming of becoming a rancher and breeding horses. However he does not have much money left to buy the livestock needed.

TEXT.English: The reputation of the theater in %s2_city is growing.
TEXT.French: La réputation de notre théâtre à %s2_city est grandissante.
TEXT.German: Der Ruf des Theaters in %s2_city wächst.
TEXT.Italian: The reputation of the theater in %s2_city is growing.
TEXT.Spanish: The reputation of the theater in %s2_city is growing.

TEXT.English: The reputation of the theater in %s2_city is growing. A famous group of actors from Europe is willing to perform there. Shall we hire them?
TEXT.French: La réputation de notre théâtre à %s2_city est grandissante. Un groupe d'acteurs célèbres venu d'Europe veut s'y produire. Devons-nous les engager ?
TEXT.German: Der Ruf des Theaters in %s2_city wächst. Eine Gruppe berühmter Schauspieler aus Europa ist bereit dort aufzutreten. Sollen wir sie engagieren?
TEXT.Italian: The reputation of the theater in %s2_city is growing. A famous group of actors from Europe is willing to perform there. Shall we hire them?
TEXT.Spanish: The reputation of the theater in %s2_city is growing. A famous group of actors from Europe is willing to perform there. Shall we hire them?

TEXT.English: Prostitutes in the saloon of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des prostitués dans le saloon de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Prostituierte im Saloon von %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: Prostitutes in the saloon of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Prostitutes in the saloon of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Some women have recently arrived in %s2_city and want to work as bar ladies in the saloon. Once the women of the city heard about that they started rioting. They claim that those bar ladies are prostitutes and will seduce their good men. If we don't chase those bar ladies away, the women will riot.
TEXT.French: Des femmes sont récemment arrivées à %s2_city et souhaitent travailler en tant que danseuses dans le saloon. Lorsque les femmes de de la ville ont entendu parler de cette histoire, elles ont commencé à manifester. Elles prétendent que ses danseuses sont en fait des prostitués qui veulent s'en prendre à leurs hommes. Si nous ne chassons pas les danseuses, une émeute va éclater.
TEXT.German: Eine Frauen sind in %s2_city eingetroffen und wollen im Saloon als Barfrauen arbeiten. Sobald die Frauen der Stadt davon Wind bekommen haben, haben sie sofort einen kleinen Aufstand angezettelt. Sie behaupten dass diese Barfrauen in Wahrheit Prostituierte seien und ihre guten Männer verführen wollten. Wenn wir diese Barfrauen nicht verjagen, werden die Frauen durchdrehen.
TEXT.Italian: Some women have recently arrived in %s2_city and want to work as bar ladies in the saloon. Once the women of the city heard about that they started rioting. They claim that those bar ladies are prostitutes and would seduce their good men. If we don't chase those bar ladies away, the women will riot.
TEXT.Spanish: Some women have recently arrived in %s2_city and want to work as bar ladies in the saloon. Once the women of the city heard about that they started rioting. They claim that those bar ladies are prostitutes and would seduce their good men. If we don't chase those bar ladies away, the women will riot.

TEXT.English: A dangerous wild animal is scaring the citizens of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un animal sauvage dangereux effraie les citoyens de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Wildes Tier verängstigt Bevölkerung von %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: A dangerous wild animal is scaring the citizens of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: A dangerous wild animal is scaring the citizens of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A dangerous wild animal is scaring the citizens of %s2_city. They ask for our help.
TEXT.French: Une animal sauvage dangereux effraie les citoyens de %s2_city. Ils demandent de l'aide.
TEXT.German: Ein wildes Tier verängstigt die Bevölkerung von %s2_city. Sie bitten um unsere Hilfe.
TEXT.Italian: A dangerous wild animal is scaring the citizens of %s2_city. They ask for our help.
TEXT.Spanish: A dangerous wild animal is scaring the citizens of %s2_city. They ask for our help.

TEXT.English: Smugglers caught in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des contrebandiers ont été attrapés à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Schmuggler in %s2_city gefasst.
TEXT.Italian: Smugglers caught in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Smugglers caught in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: The officials in %s2_city have caught some smugglers. They were buying salt and other goods from private traders in the city and selling it at high profits in Europe without paying customs.
TEXT.French: Des officiers de %s2_city ont attrapés des contrebandiers. Ils étaient en train d'acheter du sel et d'autres biens lorsqu'un négociant privé de la ville leur a vendu sans payer les droits de douane pour l'Europe.
TEXT.German: Die Offiziellen in %s2_city haben einige Schmuggler geschnappt. Diese haben Salz und andere Güter von privaten Händlern gekauft und dieses dann am Zoll vorbei in Europa zu hohen Profiten verkauft.
TEXT.Italian: The officials in %s2_city have caught some smugglers. They were buying salt and other goods from private traders in the city and selling it without paying customs at high profits in Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: The officials in %s2_city have caught some smugglers. They were buying salt and other goods from private traders in the city and selling it without paying customs at high profits in Europe.

TEXT.English: A chief's daughter fell in love with a white scout.
