TEXT.French: La fille d'un chef amérindien est tombée amoureuse d'un de nos éclaireurs.
TEXT.German: Die Tochter eines Häuptlings hat sich in einen weissen Scout verliebt.
TEXT.Italian: A chief's daughter fell in love with a white scout.
TEXT.Spanish: A chief's daughter fell in love with a white scout.

TEXT.English: The chief's daughter and our scout fell in love. The chief himself is not very happy but loves his daughter and thus will allow the marriage if we agree as well. If they marry, the scout will stay in the village and not work for us any longer.
TEXT.French: La fille d'un chef amérindien et l'un de nos éclaireurs sont tombés amoureux. Le chef n'est pas très heureux mais adorent sa fille, il acceptera donc le mariage si nous donnons également notre accord. S'ils se marrient, l'éclaireur restera dans le village et abandonnera sa mission.
TEXT.German: Die Tochter des Häuptlings und unser Scout haben sich verliebt. Der Häuptling ist darüber nicht besonders erfreut, liebt jedoch seine Tochter und wird der Hochzeit zustimmen, wenn auch wir unsere Zustimmung geben. Falls die beiden heiraten, wird der Scout im Dorf bleiben und nicht mehr für uns arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: The chief's daughter and our scout fell in love. The chief himself is not very happy but loves his daughter and thus will allow the marriage if we agree as well. If they marry, the scout will stay in the village and not work for us any longer.
TEXT.Spanish: The chief's daughter and our scout fell in love. The chief himself is not very happy but loves his daughter and thus will allow the marriage if we agree as well. If they marry, the scout will stay in the village and not work for us any longer.

TEXT.English: While passing a Native village, one of our Native Mercenaries has been invited to stay for a while to exchange stories and knowledge.
TEXT.French: En passant dans un village amérindien, l'un de nos mercenaires indigènes a été invité à rester un temps pour un échange d'histoire et de savoir.
TEXT.German: Während einer unserer Indianischen Söldner ein anderes Ureinwohnerdorf durchwanderte, wurde er eingeladen eine Weile zu bleiben um Geschichten auszutauschen und neues Wissen zu erlangen.
TEXT.Italian: While passing a Native village, one of our Native Mercenaries has been invited to stay for a while to exchange stories and knowledge.
TEXT.Spanish: While passing a Native village, one of our Native Mercenaries has been invited to stay for a while to exchange stories and knowledge.

TEXT.English: A medical doctor from Europe wants to fight diseases of the White Man that are spreading in Native villages.
TEXT.French: Un médecin venu d'Europe souhaite combattre la maladie de l'Homme Blanc qui se propage dans les villages indigènes.
TEXT.German: Ein Arzt aus Europa will die Krankheiten des Weissen Mannes bekämpfen, die sich in den Dörfern der Ureinwohner verbreiten.
TEXT.Italian: Medical Doctor from Europe wants to fight diseases of the White Man that are spreading in Native Villages.
TEXT.Spanish: Medical Doctor from Europe wants to fight diseases of the White Man that are spreading in Native Villages.

TEXT.English: A medical doctor from Europe has arrived in one of our cities. He heard Native suffering and now wants to fight the diseases of the White Man that are spreading in Native villages.
TEXT.French: Un médecin venu d'Europe est arrivé dans l'une de nos ville. Il sait que les indigènes souffrent actuellement d'une épidémie venue d'Europe et souhaite la combattre.
TEXT.German: Ein Arzt aus Europa ist in einer unserer Städte eingetroffen und will die Krankheiten des Weissen Mannes bekämpfen, die sich in den Dörfern der Ureinwohner verbreiten.
TEXT.Italian: A medical doctor from Europe has arrived in on of our cities. He heard about the situation of the Natives and now wants to fight the diseases of the White Man that are spreading in Native Villages.
TEXT.Spanish: A medical doctor from Europe has arrived in on of our cities. He heard about the situation of the Natives and now wants to fight the diseases of the White Man that are spreading in Native Villages.

TEXT.English: One of our transports had an accident and broke its axle.
TEXT.French: L'une de nos unités de transport a eu un accident et casser un essieu.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer Warentransporte hatte einen Unfall und brach sich dabei die Achse.
TEXT.Italian: One of our transports had an accident and broke its axis.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our transports had an accident and broke its axis.

TEXT.English: One of our transports had an accident and broke its axle. It can be repaired. If we pay to send help, it will be fixed sooner.
TEXT.French: L'une de nos unités de transport a eu un accident et casser un essieu. Même si la réparation est difficile, elle reste possible. Si nous payons pour avoir de l'aide, la réparation pourrait s'accélérer.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer Warentransporte hatte einen Unfall und brach sich dabei die Achse. Der Schaden ist zwar schwerwiegend, kann aber repariert werden. Wenn wir etwas Geld zahlen um Hilfe zu schicken, wahrscheinlich sogar recht bald.
TEXT.Italian: One of our transports had an accident and broke its axis. It is quite difficult but possible to repair. If we pay to send some help, it will probably be repaired again sooner.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our transports had an accident and broke its axis. It is quite difficult but possible to repair. If we pay to send some help, it will probably be repaired again sooner.

TEXT.English: An officer recognized a petty criminal as a former brother in arms.
TEXT.French: Un officier a reconnu un criminel comme un ancien frère d'armes.
TEXT.German: Ein Offizier hat einen Kriminellen als ehemaligen Waffenbruder wiedererkannt.
TEXT.Italian: An officer recognized a petty criminal as a former brother in arms.
TEXT.Spanish: An officer recognized a petty criminal as a former brother in arms.

TEXT.English: One of our officers approaches us and tells us that he recognized one of the petty criminals as a former brother in arms. He says that the man was rewarded for bravery and was a good soldier, though he had serious problems with discipline and alcohol. He was imprisoned for attacking a superior officer after that superior insulted him. Our officer pleads with us to give the criminal a second chance.
TEXT.French: L'un de nos officiers s'est approché de nous pour nous dire qu'il avait reconnu parmi les criminels un ancien frère d'armes. Il nous a dit que l'homme avait été récompensé pour sa bravoure et que c'était un bon soldat, mais qu'il souffrait de problèmes d'alcool et de discipline. Il a été emprisonné pour avoir battu un officier supérieur qui l'avait insulté. Notre officier nous demande de donner une seconde chance à ce criminel.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer Offiziere hat einen der Kriminellen als ehemaligen Soldaten und Waffenbruder wiedererkannt. Dieser soll ein guter man und mutiger Soldat gewesen sein. Jedoch mit Problemen bei der Disziplin und mit dem Alkohol. Er wurde verurteilt, weil er einen Vorgesetzten aufgrund einer Beleidigung zusammengeschlagen hat. Unser Offizier bittet, dass wir Gnade erweisen und dem Mann eine zweite Chance geben.
TEXT.Italian: One of our officers approaches us and tells us that he recognized one of the petty criminals as a former brother in arms. He tells that that man had been rewarded for bravery and was a good soldier, only having serious problems with discipline and alcohol. He had been imprisoned for beating a superior officer when that superior insulted him. Our officer pleads us to give the criminal a second chance.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our officers approaches us and tells us that he recognized one of the petty criminals as a former brother in arms. He tells that that man had been rewarded for bravery and was a good soldier, only having serious problems with discipline and alcohol. He had been imprisoned for beating a superior officer when that superior insulted him. Our officer pleads us to give the criminal a second chance.

TEXT.English: A Native Slave has saved the life of a colonist.
TEXT.French: Un esclave indigène a sauvé la vie d'un de nos colons.
TEXT.German: Ein Ureinwohnersklave hat das Leben eines Siedlers gerettet.
TEXT.Italian: A Native Slave has saved the life of a colonist.
TEXT.Spanish: A Native Slave has saved the life of a colonist.

TEXT.English: A Native Slave has saved the life of one of our colonists when wild horses were about to trample him. The colonist now asks that this slave be set free for his bravery.
TEXT.French: Un esclave indigène a sauvé la vie de l'un de nos colons lorsque des chevaux sont devenus fous et allaient le piétiner. Le colon demande que l'esclave recouvre sa liberté pour le remercier de son courage.
TEXT.German: Ein Ureinwohnersklave hat das Leben eines unserer Siedlers gerettet, als einige Pferde durchgingen und den Siedler beinahe überrannte. Der Siedler bitten nun, dass der Ureinwohnersklave aufgrund seines Mutes die Freiheit bekommt.
TEXT.Italian: A Native Slave has saved the life of one of our colonists when some horses went wild and were going to stamped over him. The colonist now demands, that this slave is set free for his bravery.
TEXT.Spanish: A Native Slave has saved the life of one of our colonists when some horses went wild and were going to stamped over him. The colonist now demands, that this slave is set free for his bravery.

TEXT.English: A Statesman is using his diplomatic connections.
TEXT.French: Un homme d'État utilise son réseau diplomatique.
TEXT.German: Ein Staatsmann nutzt seine diplomatischen Beziehungen.
TEXT.Italian: A Statesman is using his diplomatic connections.
TEXT.Spanish: A Statesman is using his diplomatic connections.

TEXT.English: One of our Statesmen told us that he has diplomatic connections to another statesman from one of our colonial neighbours. They could even be called friends. He also knows that the other statesman is not very satisfied with his current employment and could be convinced to work for us instead.
TEXT.French: Un de nos hommes d'États nous a expliqué qu'il avait des relations diplomatiques proches avec un collègue chez une puissance coloniale voisine. Il dit qu'ils peuvent même être considéré comme amis. Il sait également que cet autre homme d'État vit des moments difficiles et pourraient être tenté de venir nous rejoindre.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer Staatsmänner berichtet uns, dass er diplatische Beziehungen zu einem andere Staatsmann eines unsere europäischen Nachbarn hat und diesen sogar als Freund bezeichnet. Er weiss von diesem Staatsmann, dass dieser mit seiner aktuellen Stelle unzufrieden ist und überzeugt werden könnte stattdessen für uns zu arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: One of our Statesmen told us, that he does have some diplomatic relations to another Statesman from one of our colonial neighbours. He says that they could even be called friends. He also knows that the other Statesman is not very satisfied with his current employment and could be convinced to work for us instead.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our Statesmen told us, that he does have some diplomatic relations to another Statesman from one of our colonial neighbours. He says that they could even be called friends. He also knows that the other Statesman is not very satisfied with his current employment and could be convinced to work for us instead.

TEXT.English: The Printing Press in %s2_city still functions.
TEXT.French: L'imprimerie de %s2_city n'est pas utilisée à pleine capacité.
TEXT.German: Die Druckerpresse in %s2_city hat noch freie Druckkapazität.
TEXT.Italian: Printing Press in %s2_city still has printing capacity.
TEXT.Spanish: Printing Press in %s2_city still has printing capacity.

TEXT.English: The Printing Press in %s2_city still is working. But the citizens ask for something besides political pamphlets to be printed.
TEXT.French: L'imprimerie de %s2_city n'est pas utilisée à pleine capacité. Les citoyens demandent si nous ne pourrions pas imprimer autre chose que des pamphlets politiques.
TEXT.German: Die Druckerpresse in %s2_city hat noch freie Druckkapazität. Die Bewohner der Stadt bitten aber, dass etwas anderes als politische Pamphlete gedruckt werden solle.
TEXT.Italian: The Printing Press in %s2_city still has printing capacity. But the citizens ask for something else than political pamphlets to be printed.
TEXT.Spanish: The Printing Press in %s2_city still has printing capacity. But the citizens ask for something else than political pamphlets to be printed.

TEXT.English: Experienced Sailors to be hired in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des marins experimentés sont à embaucher à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Erfahrene Seeleute wollen in %s2_city angeheuert werden.
TEXT.Italian: Experienced Sailors to be hired in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Experienced Sailors to be hired in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Experienced Sailors have arrived in %s2_city and are looking for employment. They could be hired for one of our ships. They look like they have gone through some really hard times.
TEXT.French: Des marins experimentés sont arrivés à %s2_city et cherchent un emploi. Ils pourraient être embauchés dans l'un de nos navires. Ils ont l'air d'avoir vécu des épreuves difficiles.
TEXT.German: Erfahrene Seeleute sind in %s2_city eingetroffen und suchen nach Arbeit. Wir könnten sie als Besatzung für eines unserer Schiffe anheuern. Sie scheinen harte Zeiten durchgemacht zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: Experienced Sailors have arrived in %s2_city and are looking for employment. They could be hired for one of our ships. They look like they have gone through some really hard times.
TEXT.Spanish: Experienced Sailors have arrived in %s2_city and are looking for employment. They could be hired for one of our ships. They look like they have gone through some really hard times.

TEXT.English: A bishop was appointed in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un évêque a été nommé à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein Bischof wurde in %s2_city ernannt.
TEXT.Italian: A bishop was appointed in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: A bishop was appointed in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Authorities of the church have contacted us. They say that the colonies need to have a Bishop to guide the believers. One of our Priests in %s2_city fulfills all criteria and could become our Bishop. The bureaucracy, however is expensive.
TEXT.French: Les autorités de l'Église nous ont contacté. Elles prétendent qu'un évêque est nécessaire pour guider les croyants de nos colonies. L'un de nos prêtres à %s2_city remplit les critères pour être promu en tant qu'évêque. L'édit administratif pour le permettre peut cependant coûter cher.
TEXT.German: Authoritäten der Kriche haben uns kontaktiert. Sie sagen, dass die Kolonien einen Bischof brauchen um die Gläubigen zu führen. Einer unsere Prediger in %s2_city erfüllt die Kriterien und kann zum Bischof ernannt werden. Der bürokratische Vorgang der Ernennung ist jedoch aufwendig und teuer.
TEXT.Italian: Authorities of the church have contacted us. They say that the colonies need to have a Bishop to guide the believers. One of our Priests in %s2_city fulfills all criterias and could be appointed to become our Bishop. The burocratic act however is expensive.
TEXT.Spanish: Authorities of the church have contacted us. They say that the colonies need to have a Bishop to guide the believers. One of our Priests in %s2_city fulfills all criterias and could be appointed to become our Bishop. The burocratic act however is expensive.

TEXT.English: Rumours are spreading that coca leaves improve the morale of slaves.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs se propagent que les feuilles de coca pourraient avoir un effet positif sur le moral de nos esclaves.
TEXT.German: Gerüchte verbreiten sich, dass Cocablätter sich positiv auf die Arbeitsmoral von Sklaven auswirken.
TEXT.Italian: Rumors are spreading that coca leaves have positive effect on working morale of slaves.
TEXT.Spanish: Rumors are spreading that coca leaves have positive effect on working morale of slaves.

TEXT.English: A slave trader has approached us with a business deal because he heard about the positive effects of Coca Leaves on working morale of slaves. He offers us some of his slaves in exchange for a load of our coca leaves.
TEXT.French: Un marchand d'esclaves nous a approché et nous proposons un marché. Il a entendu parler d'effets positifs des feuilles de coca sur le moral des esclaves. Ils nous proposent de nous offrir des esclaves en échange d'une cargaison de nos feuilles de coca
TEXT.German: Ein Sklavenhändler hat uns kontaktiert um uns ein Geschäft vorzuschlagen, da er von der positiven Wirkung von Cocablättern auf die Arbeitsmoral von Sklaven gehört hat. Er bietet uns einige seiner Skalven im Austausch für eine Ladung unserer Cocablätter.
TEXT.Italian: A slave trader has approached us to offer a business deal because he heard about the positive effects of Coca Leaves on working morale of slaves. He offers us some of his slaves in exchange for a load of our coca leaves.
TEXT.Spanish: A slave trader has approached us to offer a business deal because he heard about the positive effects of Coca Leaves on working morale of slaves. He offers us some of his slaves in exchange for a load of our coca leaves.

TEXT.English: Rumours are spreading that excessive consumption of coca leaves is causing problems in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs se propagent selon lesquelles la consommatione excessive de coca causerait des problèmes à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Gerüchte verbreiten sich, dass exzessiver Konsum von Cocablätter in %s2_city zu Problemen führte.
TEXT.Italian: Rumors are spreading that excessive consume of coca leaves is causing problems in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Rumors are spreading that excessive consume of coca leaves is causing problems in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Milord, we are hearing reports that coca consumption in %s2_city has very negative effects on the morale and behaviour of its citizens. Some worried people even demand that all coca leaves shall be burnt.
TEXT.French: Seigneur, selon certains rapports, la consommation excessive de feuilles de coca à %s2_city aurait des effets négatifs sur le moral et le comportement de nos citoyens. Des personnes inquiètes en appellent à ce que nous brûlions l'ensemble de notre production.
TEXT.German: Mylord, wir hören immer mehr Berichte, dass der Konsum von Cocablättern in %s2_city sehr schlechte Auswirkungen auf die Moral und das Verhalten seiner Bevölkerung hat. Einige besorgte Bürger bitten sogar darum, dass alle Cocablätter verbrannt werden.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, we are hearing reports that the consume of coca leaves in %s2_city has very negative effects on the morale and behaviour of its citizens. Some worried people even demand, that all coca leaves shall be burnt.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, we are hearing reports that the consume of coca leaves in %s2_city has very negative effects on the morale and behaviour of its citizens. Some worried people even demand, that all coca leaves shall be burnt.

TEXT.English: His Majesty has placed a vicegerent into your colonies in order to regain control.
TEXT.French: His Majesty has delegated a vicegerent into your colonies in order to regain control.
TEXT.German: Es heißt der König habe aufgrund der steigenden Zahl von Kolonien in der Neuen Welt einen Gouverneur nach %s2_city entsandt.
TEXT.Italian: His Majesty has delegated a vicegerent into your colonies in order to regain control.
TEXT.Spanish: His Majesty has delegated a vicegerent into your colonies in order to regain control.

TEXT.English: Milord, your colonies are growing fast but administration leaves a lot to be desired. Unacceptable. Therefore His Majesty has decided to put a viceregent into your colonies in order to regain control.
TEXT.French: Mylord, your colonies are growing fast and faster but the administration leaves a lot to be desired. This is unacceptable. Therefore His Majesty has decided to delegate a viceregent into your colonies in order to regain control.
TEXT.German: Mylord, die Anzahl der von Euch verwalteten Kolonien in der Neuen Welt wächst stetig und die Verwaltungsstrukturen lassen noch arg zu wünschen übrig. Wir haben daher entschieden, unseren Cousin Dritten Grades als Statthalter zu entsenden, um die Verwaltung der Kolonien neu zu ordnen.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, your colonies are growing fast and faster but the administration leaves a lot to be desired. This is unacceptable. Therefore His Majesty has decided to delegate a viceregent into your colonies in order to regain control.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, your colonies are growing fast and faster but the administration leaves a lot to be desired. This is unacceptable. Therefore His Majesty has decided to delegate a viceregent into your colonies in order to regain control.

TEXT.English: The Governor of the Colonies has a secret lover in the Old World.
TEXT.French: The Governor of the Colonies has a secret lover in the Old World.
TEXT.German: Gerüchte machen den Lauf, dass der Gouverneur eine Geliebte in der Alten Welt hat.
TEXT.Italian: The Governor of the Colonies has a secret lover in the Old World.
TEXT.Spanish: The Governor of the Colonies has a secret lover in the Old World.

TEXT.English: Milord, letters were found in the room of the Governor by the cleaning personel. They prove that he had a secret lover among the palace servants of his Royal Majesty in the Old World. She was thrown out of the palace and is now living in poverty.
TEXT.French: Mylord, letters were found in the room of the Governor by the cleaning personell. They prove that he had a secret lover from the palace servants of his Royal Majesty in the Old World. She was thrown out of the palace and is now living in poverty.
TEXT.German: Mylord, es wurden vom Reinigungspersonal Briefe im Raum des Gouverneurs gefunden, die beweisen dass er eine geheime Geliebte unter den Palastbediensteten seiner Majestät in der alten Welt hatte. Sie wurde aus dem Palast geworfen und lebt nun in den Armenvierteln.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, letters were found in the room of the Governor by the cleaning personell. They prove that he had a secret lover from the palace servants of his Royal Majesty in the Old World. She was thrown out of the palace and is now living in poverty.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, letters were found in the room of the Governor by the cleaning personell. They prove that he had a secret lover from the palace servants of his Royal Majesty in the Old World. She was thrown out of the palace and is now living in poverty.

TEXT.English: It seems that a well-educated refugee intends to sail to the New World.
TEXT.French: It seems that a well educated refugee intends to sail into the New World.
TEXT.German: Ein Studierter möchte in die Neue Welt reisen und sich %s2_city anschließen.
TEXT.Italian: It seems that a well educated refugee intends to sail into the New World.
TEXT.Spanish: It seems that a well educated refugee intends to sail into the New World.

TEXT.English: Milord, the opportunity for liberty in the New World now causes well-educated people to leave their homes and to sail to the New Word. A graduate wishes to join our own colony, if we will pay his passage.
TEXT.French: Mylord, the benefits of liberty in the New World obviously also causes well educated people to leave their homes and to sail into the New Word. It seems that a graduate wishes to join our own colonies, in case we are willing to pay the passage for him.
TEXT.German: Mylord, die Vorzüge der Freiheit in der Neuen Welt lassen auch die Gebildeten aufhorchen. Es heißt, dass einer dieser Studierten sich unseren Kolonien anschließen würde, wenn wir ihm die überfahrt bezahlen.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, the benefits of liberty in the New World obviously also causes well educated people to leave their homes and to sail into the New Word. It seems that a graduate wishes to join our own colonies, in case we are willing to pay the passage for him.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, the benefits of liberty in the New World obviously also causes well educated people to leave their homes and to sail into the New Word. It seems that a graduate wishes to join our own colonies, in case we are willing to pay the passage for him.

TEXT.English: A Master Train Oil Cooker wants to join %s2_city.
TEXT.French: A Master Train Oil Cooker wants to join %s2_city.
TEXT.German: In %s2_city möchte sich uns ein Meistertrankocher anschließen.
TEXT.Italian: A Master Train Oil Cooker wants to join %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: A Master Train Oil Cooker wants to join %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Milord, whaling along our coasts promises high profits. One of the merchant vessels recently picked up a Master Train Oil Cooker in Europe, who wants to start a new life in the colonies. Shall we engage him?
TEXT.French: Mylord, whaling along our coasts promises high profits. Lucky as we are one of the merchant vessels recently picked up a Master Train Oil Cooker in Europe, who likes to start a new life in the colonies. Shall we engage him?
TEXT.German: Mylord, der Walfang vor unseren Küsten würde gute Gewinne versprechen. Wie es der Zufall will, hat der Kapitän eines Handelsschiffes in Europa einen Meistertrankocher an Bord genommen, der hier ein neues Leben beginnen möchte. Sollen wir im eine Anstellung geben?
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, whaling along our coasts promises high profits. Lucky as we are one of the merchant vessels recently picked up a Master Train Oil Cooker in Europe, who likes to start a new life in the colonies. Shall we engage him?
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, whaling along our coasts promises high profits. Lucky as we are one of the merchant vessels recently picked up a Master Train Oil Cooker in Europe, who likes to start a new life in the colonies. Shall we engage him?

TEXT.English: A trading company intends to develop %s2_city as a basis for their whaling activities.
TEXT.French: A trading company intends to develop %s2_city as basis for their whaling activities.
TEXT.German: Eine Handelskompanie möchte %s2_city als Basis für ihren Walfang ausbauen.
TEXT.Italian: A trading company intends to develop %s2_city as basis for their whaling activities.
TEXT.Spanish: A trading company intends to develop %s2_city as basis for their whaling activities.

TEXT.English: Milord, a powerful trading company intends to use one of our towns for whaling in this area. We would all benefit from this deal. They are promising ships, men and for new buildings, if we protect them. We can collect taxes for whale fat and train oil.
TEXT.French: Mylord, a powerful trading company intends to develop one of our colonies as basis for their whaling activities in this area. We should all benefit from this deal. They are promising ships, men and construction material for new buildings, in case we grant to protect them and to expose taxes for whale fat and train oil.
TEXT.German: Mylord, eine mächtige Handelskompanie möchte eine unserer Kolonien als Basis für ihren Walfang ausbauen. Davon würden wir sicher profitieren. Sie versprechen uns Schiffe, Männer und Baumaterial für neue Gebäude zu liefern, wenn wir im Gegenzug für Ihren Schutz sorgen und die Zölle auf Walspeck sowie Tranöl eine Weile aussetzen.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, a powerful trading company intends to develop one of our colonies as basis for their whaling activities in this area. We should all benefit from this deal. They are promising ships, men and construction material for new buildings, in case we grant to protect them and to expose taxes for whale fat and train oil.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, a powerful trading company intends to develop one of our colonies as basis for their whaling activities in this area. We should all benefit from this deal. They are promising ships, men and construction material for new buildings, in case we grant to protect them and to expose taxes for whale fat and train oil.

TEXT.English: Privateers are the pest of the seas.
TEXT.French: Privateers are the pest of the seas.
TEXT.German: Freibeuter werden zur Plage der Meere.
TEXT.Italian: Privateers are the pest of the seas.
TEXT.Spanish: Privateers are the pest of the seas.

TEXT.English: Milord, our neighbours have sent a diplomat. His Excellency is very upset about the privateer activities around his harbours and the increasing losses of merchant vessels. He demands that we revoke their letters of marque.
TEXT.French: Mylord, our neighbours have sent a diplomat. His Excellency is very upset about the privateer activities around his harbours and the increasing losses of merchant vessels. He awaits that we revoke their letters of marque.
TEXT.German: Mylord, Unsere Nachbarn haben einen Diplomaten geschickt. Seine Exzellenz ist sehr erbost über die zunehmende Anzahl von Schiffensverlusten durch Freibeuter. Man verlangt von uns, den Freibeutern ihre Kaperbriefe zu entziehen.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, our neighbours have sent a diplomat. His Excellency is very upset about the privateer activities around his harbours and the increasing losses of merchant vessels. He awaits that we revoke their letters of marque.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, our neighbours have sent a diplomat. His Excellency is very upset about the privateer activities around his harbours and the increasing losses of merchant vessels. He awaits that we revoke their letters of marque.

TEXT.English: Private investors have shifted from buccaneering to legal investments in merchant vessels.
TEXT.French: Private investors change from buccaneering to legal investments in merchant vessels.
TEXT.German: Private Eigner stellen ihre Freibeuter auf Handelsschiffahrt um.
TEXT.Italian: Private investors change from buccaneering to legal investments in merchant vessels.
TEXT.Spanish: Private investors change from buccaneering to legal investments in merchant vessels.

TEXT.English: Milord, private financiers of pirate ships have now converted their privateers into merchant vessels and will no longer raid our merchant fleet.
TEXT.French: Mylord, the private investors of the ships which letters of marque have been revoked have converted their privateers into merchant vessels and will not enhance our merchant fleet.
TEXT.German: Mylord, die Eigner der Freibeuter, deren Kaperbriefe wir eingezogen haben, haben ihr Schiff in ein Handelsschiff umgerüstet und werden von nun an unsere Handelsflotte verstärken.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, the private investors of the ships which letters of marque have been revoked have converted their privateers into merchant vessels and will not enhance our merchant fleet.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, the private investors of the ships which letters of marque have been revoked have converted their privateers into merchant vessels and will not enhance our merchant fleet.

TEXT.English: Privateers will be mercilessly hunted.
TEXT.French: Privateers will be mercilessly hunted.
TEXT.German: Freibeuter werden gnadenlos gejagt.
TEXT.Italian: Privateers will be mercilessly hunted.
TEXT.Spanish: Privateers will be mercilessly hunted.

TEXT.English: Milord, one of our new privateers has been captured by our neighbour's navy. The buccaneers have been hanged without mercy.
TEXT.French: Mylord, one of our new privateers has been taken by the marine of our neighbours. The buccaneers have been hanged without mercy.
TEXT.German: Mylord, der Freibeuter, den wir kürzlich mit einem neuen Kaperbrief ausstatteten, wurde von der Marine unserer Konkurenten aufgebracht und die Freibeuter wegen Piraterie gehängt.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, one of our new privateers has been taken by the marine of our neighbours. The buccaneers have been hanged without mercy.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, one of our new privateers has been taken by the marine of our neighbours. The buccaneers have been hanged without mercy.

TEXT.English: A native from a tribe nearby wishes to join our colony.
TEXT.German: Ein Ureinwohner möchte sich euch schließen.

TEXT.English: Commander, a native wishes to settle down at our city. He fled from his tribe instead to fight against their enemies. That means he is a coward.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein eingeschüchterter Indianer steht demütig in Eurer Gesindestube. Sein Stamm habe ihn verstoßen, weil er bei einem Überfall von Conquistadores auf sein Dorf geflohen war, statt zu kämpfen. Er bittet um Eure Gnade und eine neue Chance.

TEXT.English: You get a converted native.
TEXT.German: Ein Konvertierter Ureinwohner schließt sich Euch an.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native wishes to settle down in our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Missionar reist derzeit durch unsere Kolonien. Sein indianischer Diener, der ihn begleitet, will ihn verlassen, weil er die unsittlichen Annäherungen seines Herrn satt hat.

TEXT.English: You get a converted native.
TEXT.German: Ein Konvertierter Ureinwohner schließt sich Euch an.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, der Gemeindepfarrer fragt, ob ihr Euch eines Indianerjünglings annehmen könnt. Er habe Vater und Mutter durch die Blattern verloren und stehe jetzt ganz alleine da.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Indianer wurde in Eurem Gotteshaus bei dem Versuch erwischt, den silbernen Messkelch zu stehlen. Die Rothaut ist reuig und möchte ihre Schuld durch tätige Buße begleichen.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, der Gemeindepfarrer konnte im Beichtstuhl eine Rothaut davon überzeugen, dass seine halbwilde Natur nicht gottgefällig ist und nur durch harte Arbeit unter Eurem strengen Kommando gezügelt werden könne.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein vorbeiziehender Indianer hat der Anblick der bunten Glasfenster in Eurem Gotteshaus bezaubert. Er sah das Morgenlicht durch sie hindurch in seine Seele leuchten, meint er. Nun möchte er unter uns Weißen leben.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Indianer erlebte beim zufälligen Besuch unseres Gottesdienstes eine Vision. Er sah den Heiland mit einem Flammenschwerte am Altar stehen, in der Linken trug er den abgeschlagenen Kopf eines Wolfes. Ehrfürchtig möchte sich die Rothaut nun unserem Kampfe anschließen.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein junger Indianer bittet Euch, ihm das Lesen beizubringen, damit er in unserem Gotteshaus die Heilige Schrift studieren kann. Im Gegenzug bietet er an, überall anzupacken, wo Not am Mann ist.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, eine Rothaut möchte Manitou abschwören und stattdessen unserem Herrn Jesus Christus dienen.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Indianerjüngling hat sich in die Statue der Heiligen Jungfrau Maria verliebt, die in unserem Gotteshaus steht. Er möchte nun in unserer Gemeinde leben, um stets in ihrer Nähe zu sein.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, wir haben eine Rothaut erwischt, die in den Keller unseres Gotteshauses eingebrochen und ein ganzes Fässchen unseres Messweines ausgesoffen hat. Der Bursche ist reuig und will seine Schuld durch Dienste abtragen.

TEXT.English: A forest fire sparked by lightning has raged across the land near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un feu de forêt provoqué par la foudre s'est propagé autour de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Viele Bürger von %s2_city verlieren bei den Bränden ihr Hab und Gut. Die Menschen sind empört.
TEXT.Italian: Un incendio forestale, causato da un fulmine, ha devastato il territorio vicino a %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Un incendio forestal causado por un rayo ha asolado las tierras aledañas a %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Playing children from %s2_city sparked a fire in the nearby forest and went home without stamping out the fire. Many acres of forest are burnt down due to these brats!
TEXT.French: Catastrophe à %s2_city : l'incendie d'un village s'est propagé à la forêt, brûlant des milliers d'hectares.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Bursche aus %s2_city und seine Maid wollen heiraten, doch sind ihre Väter zwei rivalisierende Köhler und einander spinnefeind. Die störrischen Waldschraten wollen den Beiden nicht ihren Segen geben. Nun hat sich das verzweifelte Pärchen im Forst versteckt und droht, ein Feuer zu legen, um die Alten zu erpressen. Die Bürger fürchten, ein Waldbrand könne die ganze Gegend verwüsten, und bitten Euch einzugreifen.
TEXT.Italian: Tragedia nei pressi di %s2_city: è scoppiato un incendio in un villaggio e si è propagato alla vicina foresta, devastando il territorio per chilometri.
TEXT.Spanish: La tragedia se ha cebado con %s2_city, pues un incendio en la aldea se ha propagado al bosque, y ha chamuscado una gran superficie de tierra.

TEXT.English: Playing children from %s2_city sparked a fire in the nearby forest and went home without stamping out the fire. Many acres of forest are burnt down due to these brats!
TEXT.French: Catastrophe à %s2_city : l'incendie d'un village s'est propagé à la forêt, brûlant des milliers d'hectares.
TEXT.German: In %s2_city haben ein paar übermütige Burschen dem Dorfnarren eingeredet, durch den nahen Forst streife ein Werwolf, der es auf ihn höchstpersönlich abgesehen habe. Daraufhin hat der verängstigte Tölpel im Wald ein Feuer gelegt, um die Bestie zu verbrennen. Der Ostwind hat die Flammen entfacht, und eine Feuerwalze rast durch das Land. Die Todeshitze droht viele Hektar in rußige Asche zu verwandeln.
TEXT.Italian: Tragedia nei pressi di %s2_city: è scoppiato un incendio in un villaggio e si è propagato alla vicina foresta, devastando il territorio per chilometri.
TEXT.Spanish: La tragedia se ha cebado con %s2_city, pues un incendio en la aldea se ha propagado al bosque, y ha chamuscado una gran superficie de tierra.

TEXT.English: The word is that in %s2_city a lazy Admiral eats the governor out of house and home.
TEXT.French: The word is that in %s2_city a lazy Admial eats the governor out of house and home.
TEXT.German: Man munkelt, dass ein untätiger Admiral durch seine Gelage in %s2_city dem örtlichen Statthalter die Haare vom Kompf frisst.
TEXT.Italian: The word is that in %s2_city a lazy Admial eats the governor out of house and home.
TEXT.Spanish: The word is that in %s2_city a lazy Admial eats the governor out of house and home.

TEXT.English: Milord, the new Admiral eats and drinks more than we can afford and spends more time with women than with the new recruits. His banquets are common talk. We have to do something to stop it.
TEXT.French: Mylord, the new Admiral who arrived recently eats and drinks more than we can tolerate and spents more time with women than with the new recruits. His banquets are common talk. We have to do something to stop it.
TEXT.German: Mylord, einer unserer neu bestallten Admiräle feiert lieber und labt sich an Wein und Frauen, als dass er unseren jungen Matrosen Seemannschaft beibringt. Seine Gelage sind schon Stadtgespräch. Wir müssen etwas unternehmen, so etwas ist schlecht für die Moral.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, the new Admiral who arrived recently eats and drinks more than we can tolerate and spents more time with women than with the new recruits. His banquets are common talk. We have to do something to stop it.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, the new Admiral who arrived recently eats and drinks more than we can tolerate and spents more time with women than with the new recruits. His banquets are common talk. We have to do something to stop it.

TEXT.English: In %s2_city the navy equips a sloop. It seems that the Admiral will get his sailing orders soon.
TEXT.French: In %s2_city the navy equips a sloop. It seems that the Admiral will get his sailing order soon.
TEXT.German: In %s2_city rüstet die Marine eine neue Sloop aus. Der Admiral wird wohl bald seine Segelorder erhalten.
TEXT.Italian: In %s2_city the navy equips a sloop. It seems that the Admiral will get his sailing order soon.
TEXT.Spanish: In %s2_city the navy equips a sloop. It seems that the Admiral will get his sailing order soon.

TEXT.English: But it seems that the governor in %s2_city is a generous man.
TEXT.French: But it seems that the governor in %s2_city is a generous man.
TEXT.German: Aber der Statthalter in %s2_city ist offenbar ein großzügiger Mann.
TEXT.Italian: But it seems that the governor in %s2_city is a generous man.
TEXT.Spanish: But it seems that the governor in %s2_city is a generous man.

TEXT.English: You have built your first wagon train but the traders of our colonies urge you to build at least five of them to support our inland cities and dominate domestic trade with our own goods. If you are the first nation to do so they offer a reward.
TEXT.French: You have built your first wagon train but the traders of our colonies urge you to build at least five of them to support our inland cities and dominate domestic trade with our own goods. If you succeed to be the first Nation to do so they offer a reward.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt euren ersten Wagenzug erworben, aber die Händler der Colonien verlangen von euch, dass ihr mindestens five davon baut um unsere Inlandsstädte zu versorgen und den heimischen Markt mit unseren eigenen Waren zu versorgen. Wenn Ihr die erste Nation seid, die dies erreicht, bieten Sie eine Belohnung.
TEXT.Italian: You have built your first wagon train but the traders of our colonies urge you to build at least five of them to support our inland cities and dominate domestic trade with our own goods. If you succeed to be the first Nation to do so they offer a reward.
TEXT.Spanish: You have built your first wagon train but the traders of our colonies urge you to build at least five of them to support our inland cities and dominate domestic trade with our own goods. If you succeed to be the first Nation to do so they offer a reward.

TEXT.English: We will do as the traders ask. Our wagon trains shall travel the roads of the New World, delivering goods to the markets of all colonial cities and to our Native neighbours.
TEXT.French: We will do as the traders ask. Our wagon trains shall roam the roads and land of the New World and deliver goods to markets of all colonial cities and our Native neighbours.
TEXT.German: Wir werden tun, wie es die Händler erbitten. Unsere Wagenzüge sollen alle Straßen und Länder der Neuen Welt befahren und Waren auf alle Mäkrte der Kolonien und zu unserene Nachbarn den Ureinwohnern liefern.
TEXT.Italian: We will do as the traders ask. Our wagon trains shall roam the roads and land of the New World and deliver goods to markets of all colonial cities and our Native neighbours.
TEXT.Spanish: We will do as the traders ask. Our wagon trains shall roam the roads and land of the New World and deliver goods to markets of all colonial cities and our Native neighbours.

TEXT.English: For God's sake! Another governor has built five wagon trains before we were able to. Forget about any rewards.
TEXT.French: For God's sake! Another governor has built five wagon trains before we were able to. Forget about any rewards.
TEXT.German: Schlechte Kunde! Einem anderen Gouverneur ist es als erstem gelungen fünf Wagenzüge zu erwerben. Die Belohnung der Händler ist hinfällig.
TEXT.Italian: For God's sake! Another governor has built five wagon trains before we were able to. Forget about any rewards.
TEXT.Spanish: For God's sake! Another governor has built five wagon trains before we were able to. Forget about any rewards.

TEXT.English: A colonial nation has built five wagon trains.
TEXT.French: A colonial nation has built five wagon trains.
TEXT.German: Eine Kolonialmacht hat fünf Wagenzüge erworben.
TEXT.Italian: A colonial nation has built five wagon trains.
TEXT.Spanish: A colonial nation has built five wagon trains.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You are the first governor with five wagon trains in the New World. The Lord's blessing is upon you. The traders are in a generous mood.
TEXT.French: Congratulations! You are the first governor with five wagon trains in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The traders are in generous mood.
TEXT.German: Glückwunsch! Ihr seid der erste Gouverneur, der es geschafft hat fünf Wagenzüge in der Neuen Welt zu erwerben. Der Segen Gottes liegt auf euch und die Händler sind in großzügiger Stimmung.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations! You are the first governor with five wagon trains in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The traders are in generous mood.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations! You are the first governor with five wagon trains in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The traders are in generous mood.

TEXT.English: The traders will pay us for the use of our wagon trains.
TEXT.French: The traders shall compensate our efforts by paying some of their earned income using our wagon trains to us
TEXT.German: Die Händer sollen einen Teil unserer Aufwände durch ihr Einkommen kompensieren, dass sie mit unseren Wagenzügen erworben haben.
TEXT.Italian: The traders shall compensate our efforts by paying some of their earned income using our wagon trains to us
TEXT.Spanish: The traders shall compensate our efforts by paying some of their earned income using our wagon trains to us

TEXT.English: Now that we have so many wagon trains, we could use some more pioneers to build roads.
TEXT.French: Now that we have so many new wagon trains, we could use some more pioneers to build them. The traders could hire them for us.
TEXT.German: Nun da wir so viele neue Wagenzüge haben, benötigen wir auch mehr Pioniere um Straßen für sie zu bauen. Die Händler sollen diese für uns anwerben.
TEXT.Italian: Now that we have so many new wagon trains, we could use some more pioneers to build them. The traders could hire them for us.
TEXT.Spanish: Now that we have so many new wagon trains, we could use some more pioneers to build them. The traders could hire them for us.

TEXT.English: We have now set up a basic fur trade in our colonies but our Majesty orders us to expand the business by hiring at least five fur trappers. If we are the first Nation to do so, His Majesty offers a reward.
TEXT.French: We have now set up basic fur trade in our colonies but our Majesty orders us to expand our fur business my hiring at least five fur trappers. If we achieve to be the first Nation to do so, his Majesty will offer a reward.
TEXT.German: Wir haben einen grundlegenden aber florierenden Pelzhandel etabliert. Seine Majestät befiehlt aber den Prozess zu beschleunigen und weiter in den Pelzandel zu expanidieren, indem wir mindestens fünf Pelzhändler anwerben. Wenn wir dies als erste Nation schaffen, verspricht Ihre Majestät eine Belohnung.
TEXT.Italian: We have now set up basic fur trade in our colonies but our Majesty orders us to expand our fur business my hiring at least five fur trappers. If we achieve to be the first Nation to do so, his Majesty will offer a reward.
TEXT.Spanish: We have now set up basic fur trade in our colonies but our Majesty orders us to expand our fur business my hiring at least five fur trappers. If we achieve to be the first Nation to do so, his Majesty will offera reward.

TEXT.English: We will do as His Majesty orders. Our new nation will dominate the fur trade of the New World and our citizens will enjoy luxurious fur.
TEXT.French: We will do as his Majesty orders. Our new nation will dominate the fur trade of the New World and our homeland will indulge in luxurious fur.
TEXT.German: Wir werden den Befehlen seiner Majestät gehorchen. Unsere Nation wir den Pelzhandel der Neuen Welt dominieren und unser Heimatland wird in luxuriösen Pelzen schwelgen.
TEXT.Italian: We will do as his Majesty orders. Our new nation will dominate the fur trade of the New World and our homeland will indulge in luxurious fur.
TEXT.Spanish: We will do as his Majesty orders. Our new nation will dominate the fur trade of the New World and our homeland will indulge in luxurious fur.

TEXT.English: For God's sake! Another colonial nation has succeeded in acquiring five fur trappers first and now dominates the fur market.
TEXT.French: For God's sake! Another colonial nation has succeeded in acquiring five fur trappers first and now dominates the fur market.
TEXT.German: Schlechte Kunde! Einer anderen Kolonialmahct ist es gelungen als erstes fünf erfahrene Pelzjäger zu erwerben und dominiert nun den Pelzhandel.
TEXT.Italian: For God's sake! Another colonial nation has succeeded in acquiring five fur trappers first and now dominates the fur market.
TEXT.Spanish: For God's sake! Another colonial nation has succeeded in acquiring five fur trappers first and now dominates the fur market.

TEXT.English: A colonial nation has acquired five fur trappers.
TEXT.French: A colonial nation has acquired five fur trappers.
TEXT.German: Eine Kolonialmacht hat fünf Pelzjäger erworben.
TEXT.Italian: A colonial nation has acquired five fur trappers.
TEXT.Spanish: A colonial nation has acquired five fur trappers.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You are the first governor with five fur trappers in the New World. The Lord's blessing is upon you. His Majesty is delighted with the luxurious fur and is in a very generous mood.
TEXT.French: Congratulations! You are the first governor with five fur trappers in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. His Majesty is delighted by the luxurious fur we deliver and in very generous mood.
TEXT.German: Glückwunsch! Ihr seid der erste Gouverneur, der es geschafft hat fünf Pelzjäger in der Neuen Welt zu erwerben. Der Segen Gottes liegt auf euch. Ihre Majstestät ist von den luxuriösen Pelzen entzückt und in sehr großzügiger Stimmung.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations! You are the first governor with five fur trappers in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. His Majesty is delighted by the luxurious fur we deliver and in very generous mood.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations! You are the first governor with five fur trappers in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. His Majesty is delighted by the luxurious fur we deliver and in very generous mood.

TEXT.English: Declare one of our fur trading cities to be the central hub for collecting premium fur. The trappers will receive extra services. Finance it with the reward of our Majesty.
TEXT.French: Declare one of our fur trading cities to be the central hub for collecting premium fur. The trappers shall get extra services for that. Finance it with the reward of our Majesty.
TEXT.German: Benennt eine unsere Städte, die mit Pelzen handeln zum Zentralen Pelzhandlesplatz. Die Pelzjäger sollen dort zusätzliche Dienstleistungen finden. Finanziert dies mit der Belohnung Ihrer Majestät.
TEXT.Italian: Declare one of our fur trading cities to be the central hub for collecting premium fur. The trappers shall get extra services for that. Finance it with the reward of our Majesty.
TEXT.Spanish: Declare one of our fur trading cities to be the central hub for collecting premium fur. The trappers shall get extra services for that. Finance it with the reward of our Majesty.

TEXT.English: Use the reward of our Majesty to hire more fur traders from the Old World to produce more fur coats in our colonies.
TEXT.French: Use the reward of our Majesty to hire more fur traders from the Old World to produce more fur coats in our colonies.
TEXT.German: Nutzt die Belohnung Ihrere Majestät um weitere Pelzhändler aus der Neuen Welt anzuheuern, die dann wiederum mehr Pelzmäntel herstellen können.
TEXT.Italian: Use the reward of our Majesty to hire more fur traders from the Old World to produce more fur coats in our colonies.
TEXT.Spanish: Use the reward of our Majesty to hire more fur traders from the Old World to produce more fur coats in our colonies.

TEXT.English: We have acquired our first slaves. The plantation owners are very happy to have that additional work force and promise a reward if we can be the first colonial nation to get at least six cargo loads of native or African Slaves.
TEXT.French: We have acquired our first slaves. The plantation owners are very happy to have that additional work force and promise a reward if we achieve to be the first colonial nation to acquire at least six cargo loads of native slaves or african Slaves.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt eure ersten Sklaven erworben. Die Plantagenbesitzer der Kolonien fordern jedoch noch mehr. Wenn ihr als erste Nation mindestens sechs Wagenladungen Ureinwohnersklaven oder Sklaven aus Afrika erwerbt, versprechen Sie einen Belohnung.
TEXT.Italian: We have acquired our first slaves. The plantation owners are very happy to have that additional work force and promise a reward if we achieve to be the first colonial nation to acquire at least six cargo loads of native slaves or african Slaves.
TEXT.Spanish: We have acquired our first slaves. The plantation owners are very happy to have that additional work force and promise a reward if we achieve to be the first colonial nation to acquire at least six cargo loads of native slaves or african Slaves.

TEXT.English: We will do as the plantation owners ask. Our plantations will get all the work force they need.
TEXT.French: We will do as the plantation owners ask. Our plantations will get all the work force they need.
TEXT.German: Wir werden den Wünschen der Plantagenbesitzern entsprechend. Unsere Plantagen werden die Arbeitskräfte bekommen, die sie brauchen.
TEXT.Italian: We will do as the plantation owners ask. Our plantations will get all the work force they need.
TEXT.Spanish: We will do as the plantation owners ask. Our plantations will get all the work force they need.

TEXT.English: Another governor has acquired six cargo loads of slaves before we were able to. Forget about any rewards.
TEXT.French: For God's sake! Another governor has acquired six cargo loads of slaves before we were able to. Forget about any rewards.
TEXT.German: Schlechte Kunde! Einem anderen Gouverneur ist es als erstem gelungen sechs Schiffsladungen von Sklaven zu erwerben. Die Belohnung der Händler ist hinfällig.
TEXT.Italian: For God's sake! Another governor has acquired six cargo loads of slaves before we were able to. Forget about any rewards.
TEXT.Spanish: For God's sake! Another governor has acquired six cargo loads of slaves before we were able to. Forget about any rewards.

TEXT.English: A colonial nation has acquired six cargo loads of slaves.
TEXT.French: A colonial nation has acquired six cargo loads of slaves.
TEXT.German: Eine Kolonialmacht hat sechs Schiffsladungen von Sklaven erworben.
TEXT.Italian: A colonial nation has acquired six cargo loads of slaves.
TEXT.Spanish: A colonial nation has acquired six cargo loads of slaves.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You are the first colonial nation with six cargo loads of slaves to work on the plantations of the New World. The Lord's blessing upon you. The plantation owners are in a generous mood.
TEXT.French: Congratulations! You are the first colonial nation with six cargo loads of slaves to work on the plantations of the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The plantation owners are in generous mood.
TEXT.German: Glückwunsch! Ihr seid der erste Gouverneur, der es geschafft hat sechs Schiffsladungen von Sklaven in der Neuen Welt zu erwerben. Der Segen Gottes liegt auf euch und die Planatagenbesitzer sind in großzügiger Stimmung.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations! You are the first colonial nation with six cargo loads of slaves to work on the plantations of the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The plantation owners are in generous mood.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations! You are the first colonial nation with six cargo loads of slaves to work on the plantations of the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The plantation owners are in generous mood.

TEXT.English: The plantation owners will reward our efforts by paying some of their income from the additional work force we have delivered.
TEXT.French: The plantation owners shall compensate our efforts by paying some of their income they earned by the additional work force we delivered to them.
TEXT.German: Die Plantagenbesitzer sollen einen Teil unserer Aufwände durch ihr Einkommen kompensieren, dass sie mit der von uns gelieferten zusätzlichen Arbeitskraft erworben haben.
TEXT.Italian: The plantation owners shall compensate our efforts by paying some of their income they earned by the additional work force we delivered to them.
TEXT.Spanish: The plantation owners shall compensate our efforts by paying some of their income they earned by the additional work force we delivered to them.

TEXT.English: Now that we have so many slaves in the colonies, we need more guards to keep them from running away. The plantation needs more settler militia.
TEXT.French: Now that we have so many slaves in the colonies, we need to have more guards to keep them from running away. The plantation could at least hire some additional settler militia.
TEXT.German: Nun da wir so viele Sklaven in den Kolonien haben, benötigen wir auch mehr Wachen um sie daran zu hindern zu fliehen. Die Plantagenbesitzer sollen zumindest diese für uns anwerben.
TEXT.Italian: Now that we have so many slaves in the colonies, we need to have more guards to keep them from running away. The plantation could at least hire some additional settler militia.
TEXT.Spanish: Now that we have so many slaves in the colonies, we need to have more guards to keep them from running away. The plantation could at least hire some additional settler militia.

TEXT.English: We now have our first small coastal ships connecting the towns but our traders want us to expand the coastal service. If we are the first to have three small coastal ships, our traders offer a reward.
TEXT.French: We have now set up our first coastal trade and transport with small coastal ships between our colonies but our traders ask us to expand the coastal ship connections. If we achieve to be the first nation to have three small coastal ships, our traders offers a reward.
TEXT.German: Wir haben unsere ersten Küstenhandel und Küstentransport mit Küstenschiffen zwischen den Kolonien etabliert. Unsere Händler bitten jedoch darum, diesen zu erweitern. Wenn wir die erste Nation sind, die mindestens drei kleine Küstentransportschiffe hat, bieten sie eine Belohnung.
TEXT.Italian: We have now set up our first coastal trade and transport with small coastal ships between our colonies but our traders ask us to expand the coastal ship connections. If we achieve to be the first nation to have three small coastal ships, our traders offers a reward.
TEXT.Spanish: We have now set up our first coastal trade and transport with small coastal ships between our colonies but our traders ask us to expand the coastal ship connections. If we achieve to be the first nation to have three small coastal ships, our traders offers a reward.

TEXT.English: We will do as our traders ask. A better coastal ship connection will transport goods efficiently.
TEXT.French: We will do as our traders ask. A better coastal ship conncection will help us to transport our goods more efficiently.
TEXT.German: Wir werden tun, wie es die Händler erbitten. Eine bessere Küstenschiffsverbindung wird es uns erlauben Gütertransporte effizienter zu gestalten.
TEXT.Italian: We will do as our traders ask. A better coastal ship conncection will help us to transport our goods more efficiently.
TEXT.Spanish: We will do as our traders ask. A better coastal ship conncection will help us to transport our goods more efficiently.

TEXT.English: For God's sake! Another colonial nation has succeeded in getting three small coastal ships before we could. Forget any rewards.
TEXT.French: For God's sake! Another colonial nation has succeeded in acquiring three small coastal ships first before we did. Forget about any rewards.
TEXT.German: Schlechte Kunde! Einer anderen Kolonialmahct ist es gelungen als erstes drei kleine Küstentransportschiffe zu erwerben. Die Belohnung der Händler ist hinfällig.
TEXT.Italian: For God's sake! Another colonial nation has succeeded in acquiring three small coastal ships first before we did. Forget about any rewards.
TEXT.Spanish: For God's sake! Another colonial nation has succeeded in acquiring three small coastal ships first before we did. Forget about any rewards.

TEXT.English: A colonial nation has acquired three small coastal ships.
TEXT.French: A colonial nation has acquired three small coastal ships.
TEXT.German: Eine Kolonialmacht hat drei kleine Küstentransportschiffe erworben.
TEXT.Italian: A colonial nation has acquired three small coastal ships.
TEXT.Spanish: A colonial nation has acquired three small coastal ships.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You are the first governor in the New World with three small coastal ships. The Lord's blessing is upon you. The traders are delighted and in a very generous mood.
TEXT.French: Congratulations! You are the first governor with three small coastal ships in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The traders are delighted and in very generous mood.
TEXT.German: Glückwunsch! Ihr seid der erste Gouverneur, der es geschafft hat drei kleine Küstentransportschiffe in der Neuen Welt zu erwerben. Der Segen Gottes liegt auf euch. Die Händler sind in sehr großzügiger Stimmung.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations! You are the first governor with three small coastal ships in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The traders are delighted and in very generous mood.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations! You are the first governor with three small coastal ships in the New World. The Lord's blessing will be upon you. The traders are delighted and in very generous mood.

TEXT.English: Declare one of our harbour cities as the central hub for collecting the additional salt from the traders' coastal journeys. Coastal service will be improved. Finance it with the traders' reward.
TEXT.French: Declare one of our harbour cities to be the central hub for collecting the additional salt that the traders bring from their coastal journeys. The coastal ships shall get extra services for that. Finance it with the reward of our traders.
TEXT.German: Benennt eine unsere Hafenstädte, die mit Pelzen handeln zum Zentralen Salzhandelsplatz. Die Küstentransportschiffe sollen dort zusätzliche Dienstleistungen finden. Finanziert dies mit der Belohnung der Händler.
TEXT.Italian: Declare one of our harbour cities to be the central hub for collecting the additional salt that the traders bring from their coastal journeys. The coastal ships shall get extra services for that. Finance it with the reward of our traders.
TEXT.Spanish: Declare one of our harbour cities to be the central hub for collecting the additional salt that the traders bring from their coastal journeys. The coastal ships shall get extra services for that. Finance it with the reward of our traders.

TEXT.English: Use a small part of the traders' reward to build another large coastal ship. Keep the rest for expenses.
TEXT.French: Use a small part of the reward of our traders to build an additional large coastal ship and keep the rest for other expenses.
TEXT.German: Nutzt die Belohnung unserer Händler um ein größeres Küstentransportschiff zu bauen, behaltet aber einen Teil für andere Ausgaben zurück.
TEXT.Italian: Use a small part of the reward of our traders to build an additional large coastal ship and keep the rest for other expenses.
TEXT.Spanish: Use a small part of the reward of our traders to build an additional large coastal ship and keep the rest for other expenses.

TEXT.English: A native slave has been charged with neglecting his duties.
TEXT.French: A native slave has been charged with neglecting his duties.
TEXT.German: Ein Ureinwohnersklave wurde angeklagt seine Pflichten vernachlässigt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: A native slave has been charged with neglecting his duties.
TEXT.Spanish: A native slave has been charged with neglecting his duties.

TEXT.English: Mylord, a native slave is brought before the court. The master, a wealthy gentleman of the colony, declares him guilty of crimes including neglect of duties and even "carrying on in an insolent manner". The gentleman argues therefore the term of indenture should be extended 90 years as is customary in such cases. Perhaps we should take this opportunity to establish some legal boundaries regarding the treatment of native slaves.
TEXT.French: Mylord, a native slave is brought before the court. The master, a wealthy gentleman of the colony, declares him guilty of crimes including neglect of duties and even "carrying on in an insolent manner". The gentleman argues therefore the term of indenture should be extended 90 years as is customary in such cases. Perhaps we should take this opportunity to establish some legal boundaries regarding the treatment of native slaves.
TEXT.German: Mylord, ein Ureinwohnersklave wurde ins Gericht gebracht. Sein Besitzer, ein wohlhabender Gentleman der Kolonies, erklärte dass er mehrere Verbrechen begannen hat, wie seine Pflichten zu vernachlässigen und auch aufrührerisches Verhalten. Der Gentleman verlangt daher, dass die Bedingunge der Sklavenvertrages auf 90 Jahre festgelegt werden, wie es in solchen Fällen üblich ist. Wir sollten diesen Fall als Gelegenheit sehen, die Rahmenbedingungen der Haltung von Ureinwohersklaven zu klären.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, a native slave is brought before the court. The master, a wealthy gentleman of the colony, declares him guilty of crimes including neglect of duties and even "carrying on in an insolent manner". The gentleman argues therefore the term of indenture should be extended 90 years as is customary in such cases. Perhaps we should take this opportunity to establish some legal boundaries regarding the treatment of native slaves.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, a native slave is brought before the court. The master, a wealthy gentleman of the colony, declares him guilty of crimes including neglect of duties and even "carrying on in an insolent manner". The gentleman argues therefore the term of indenture should be extended 90 years as is customary in such cases. Perhaps we should take this opportunity to establish some legal boundaries regarding the treatment of native slaves.

TEXT.English: The honorable gentleman is correct. The law permits an extension to the terms of indenture when a crime has been committed.
TEXT.French: The honorable gentleman is correct. The law permits an extension to the terms of indenture when a crime has been committed.
TEXT.German: Der ehrenwerte Gentleman ist absolut im Recht. Ein Sklavenvertrag soll bei solchen schwerwiegenden Vergehen immer auf 90 Jahre festgeschrieben werden.
TEXT.Italian: The honorable gentleman is correct. The law permits an extension to the terms of indenture when a crime has been committed.
TEXT.Spanish: The honorable gentleman is correct. The law permits an extension to the terms of indenture when a crime has been committed.

TEXT.English: We should rewrite the law to protect the natives from this kind of exploitation. Free the slave and pay the gentleman for his loss.
TEXT.French: We should rewrite the law to protect the natives from this kind of exploitation. Free the slave and pay the gentleman for his loss.
TEXT.German: Wir müssen das Recht umschreiben um die Ureinwohner vor solcherlei Ausbeutung zu schützen. Befreit den Sklaven, entschädigt jedoch seinen Besitzer.
TEXT.Italian: We should rewrite the law to protect the natives from this kind of exploitation. Free the slave and pay the gentleman for his loss.
TEXT.Spanish: We should rewrite the law to protect the natives from this kind of exploitation. Free the slave and pay the gentleman for his loss.

TEXT.English: I find these legal proceedings so tedious. Arrest this slave on the charge of dereliction of duty and sell him aboard the next outbound slave ship.
TEXT.French: I find these legal proceedings so tedious. Arrest this slave on the charge of dereliction of duty and sell him aboard the next outbound slave ship.
TEXT.German: Diese ganzen Gesetze sind veraltet. Verhaftet einfach den Sklaven wegen Aufrührerei und verkauft ihn dann bei nächster Gelegenheit an das nächste auslaufende Sklavenshiff
TEXT.Italian: I find these legal proceedings so tedious. Arrest this slave on the charge of dereliction of duty and sell him aboard the next outbound slave ship.
TEXT.Spanish: I find these legal proceedings so tedious. Arrest this slave on the charge of dereliction of duty and sell him aboard the next outbound slave ship.

TEXT.English: A deceased plantation owner has freed his African slaves.
TEXT.French: A deceased planter has freed his African slaves.
TEXT.German: Ein im Sterben liegender Plantagenbesitzer hat seine schwarzen Sklaven aus der Sklaverei entlassen.
TEXT.Italian: A deceased planter has freed his African slaves.
TEXT.Spanish: A deceased planter has freed his African slaves.

TEXT.English: Mylord, a recently deceased planter left a will, in which he desires all of his African slaves be freed. No sooner had he passed away than a gang of bounty hunters arrived and put the poor people in chains. They say the planter was delirious with fever and will sell the slaves to the highest bidder. Should we intervene? Be warned, setting slaves free will be unpopular with the gentry.
TEXT.French: Mylord, a recently deceased planter left a will, in which he desires all of his African slaves be freed. No sooner had he passed away than a gang of bounty hunters arrived and put the poor people in chains. They say the planter was delirious with fever and will sell the slaves to the highest bidder. Should we intervene? Be warned, setting slaves free will be unpopular with the gentry.
TEXT.German: Mylord, ein im Sterben liegender Plantagenbesitzer hat in seinem letzten Willen verfügt, dass seine schwarzen Sklaven aus der Sklaverei entlassen werden sollen. Kurz nachdem er verstarb, sind jedoch Sklaveneintreiber erschienen und haben seine Sklaven in Ketten gelegt. Sie behaupten, dass der alte Mann nicht mehr Herr seiner Sinne gewesen sei und wollen die Sklaven an den Höchstbietenden verkaufen. Sollen wir hier eingreifen?
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, a recently deceased planter left a will, in which he desires all of his African slaves be freed. No sooner had he passed away than a gang of bounty hunters arrived and put the poor people in chains. They say the planter was delirious with fever and will sell the slaves to the highest bidder. Should we intervene? Be warned, setting slaves free will be unpopular with the gentry.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, a recently deceased planter left a will, in which he desires all of his African slaves be freed. No sooner had he passed away than a gang of bounty hunters arrived and put the poor people in chains. They say the planter was delirious with fever and will sell the slaves to the highest bidder. Should we intervene? Be warned, setting slaves free will be unpopular with the gentry.

TEXT.English: We will abide by the man's wishes.
TEXT.French: We will abide by the man's wishes.
TEXT.German: Wir werden den letzten Willen dieses Mannes respektieren.
TEXT.Italian: We will abide by the man's wishes.
TEXT.Spanish: We will abide by the man's wishes.

TEXT.English: If we let them go free soon all of our slaves will expect the same. They must be kept in bondage.
TEXT.French: If we let them go free soon all of our slaves will expect the same. They must be kept in bondage.
TEXT.German: Die Sklaven müssen weiterhin in Ketten bleiben. Würden wir sie befreien, so würde dies andere Sklaven aufstacheln ihre Freiheit zu fordern.
TEXT.Italian: If we let them go free soon all of our slaves will expect the same. They must be kept in bondage.
TEXT.Spanish: If we let them go free soon all of our slaves will expect the same. They must be kept in bondage.

TEXT.English: Allow the sale to proceed, but sell them to a foreign plantation to avoid further incident.
TEXT.French: Allow the sale to proceed, but sell them to a foreign plantation to avoid further incident.
TEXT.German: Weist die Sklaveneintreiber an, die schwarzen Sklaven an eine Plantage einer anderen Nation zu verkaufen.
TEXT.Italian: Allow the sale to proceed, but sell them to a foreign plantation to avoid further incident.
TEXT.Spanish: Allow the sale to proceed, but sell them to a foreign plantation to avoid further incident.

TEXT.English: A soldier's son has been secretly raised in a Fort.
TEXT.German: A soldier's son has been secretly raised in a Fort.

TEXT.English: Mylord, during on of the regular inspections in one of our Forts, one of its officers found out that one of the soldiers had secretly been raising his son in the fort after the child's mother had died. The young man is now 15 years and seems have become a fine lad considering these tough curcomstances for a child.
TEXT.German: Mylord, während einer der regulären Inspektionen in einem unserer Forts, fand einer der Offiziere heraus, dass einer der Soldaten heimlich seinen Sohn im Fort aufzog, nachdem die Mutter des Kindes gestorben war. Der junge Mann ist nun 15 Jahre alt und scheint trotz der schwierigen Bedingungen für ein Kind ein anständiges Wesen zu haben.

TEXT.English: The young man must surely have learned something during his time in the Fort. Take care that he finishes at least some basic training in the Militia, give him some arms and put him into service.
TEXT.German: Der junge Mann wird sicher etwas während seiner Zeit im Fort gelernt haben. Stellt sicher, dass er zumindest eine grundlegende Ausbildung in der Miliz bekommt, gebt ihm Waffen und lasst ihn in Dienst stellen.

TEXT.English: We should give the young man a chance for a normal life and let him make his own decisions once he is of age. Give him proper clothes and send him to one of our cities where he can choose a profession of his liking.
TEXT.German: Wir sollten dem jungen Mann eine Chance auf ein normales Leben geben und darauf seine eigenen Entscheidungen zu treffen. Gebt ihm saubere Kleidung, sendet ihn in eine unserer Städte und lasst ihn selbst einen Beruf wählen.

TEXT.English: There are rumours that muggers are roaming the colonies and attacking the merchants' wagon trains. Beware!
TEXT.French: There are rumours that muggers are roaming the colonies and attacking the merchants' wagon trains. Beware!
TEXT.German: Es gibt Gerüchte, dass in den Kolonien Straßenräuber ihr Unwesen treiben und die Wagenkolonnen der Händler überfallen. Hütet Euch!
TEXT.Italian: There are rumours that muggers are roaming the colonies and attacking the merchants' wagon trains. Beware!
TEXT.Spanish: There are rumours that muggers are roaming the colonies and attacking the merchants' wagon trains. Beware!

TEXT.English: Muggers have attacked a wagon train and forced the coachmen to hand over the cash. You must protect your colony better, Sire!
TEXT.French: Muggers have attacked a wagon train and forced the coachmen to hand over the cash. You must protect your colony better, Sire!
TEXT.German: Straßenräuber haben einen Wagenzug überfallen und zwingen die Kutscher zur Übergabe der Kasse. Ihr müsst Eure Kolonie besser schützen, Sire!
TEXT.Italian: Muggers have attacked a wagon train and forced the coachmen to hand over the cash. You must protect your colony better, Sire!
TEXT.Spanish: Muggers have attacked a wagon train and forced the coachmen to hand over the cash. You must protect your colony better, Sire!

TEXT.English: Your colonies are developing magnificently. Unfortunately this also attracts less friendly contemporaries. Rabbles have attacked a wagon train and demand tolls from the coachman!
TEXT.French: Your colonies are developing magnificently. Unfortunately this also attracts less friendly contemporaries. Rabbles have attacked a wagon train and demand tolls from the coachman!
TEXT.German: Eure Kolonien entwickeln sich prächtig. Leider zieht das auch weniger freundliche Zeitgenossen an. Wegelagerer haben einen Wagenzug überfallen und fordern Wegzoll vom Kutscher!
TEXT.Italian: Your colonies are developing magnificently. Unfortunately this also attracts less friendly contemporaries. Rabbles have attacked a wagon train and demand tolls from the coachman!
TEXT.Spanish: Your colonies are developing magnificently. Unfortunately this also attracts less friendly contemporaries. Rabbles have attacked a wagon train and demand tolls from the coachman!

TEXT.English: A trading company is about to set up a new trading fort in a strategic location!
TEXT.French: A trading company is about to set up a new trading fort in a strategic location!
TEXT.German: Eine Handelsgesellschaft ist drauf und dran an einer strategisch günstigen Stelle ein neues Handelsfort zu errichten!
TEXT.Italian: A trading company is about to set up a new trading fort in a strategic location!
TEXT.Spanish: A trading company is about to set up a new trading fort in a strategic location!

TEXT.English: Sire, some traders had found a favourable position for a trading post. It is strategically located to develop our trading interests in the region. Do we want to support the construction and gain an advantage?
TEXT.French: Sire, some traders had found a favourable position for a trading post. It is strategically located to develop our trading interests in the region. Do we want to support the construction and gain an advantage?
TEXT.German: Sire, einige Händler habe eine günstige Stelle für einen Handelsposten gefunden. Er liegt strategisch günstig, um unsere Handelsinteressen in der Region auszubauen. Wollen wir den Bau unterstützen und uns so einen Vorteil verschaffen?
TEXT.Italian: Sire, some traders had found a favourable position for a trading post. It is strategically located to develop our trading interests in the region. Do we want to support the construction and gain an advantage?
TEXT.Spanish: Sire, some traders had found a favourable position for a trading post. It is strategically located to develop our trading interests in the region. Do we want to support the construction and gain an advantage?

TEXT.English: Sire, a messenger has arrived. One of our trading companies wants to set up a trading fort at the border. This would benefit us, but would anger our neighbours. What should we do?
TEXT.French: Sire, a messenger has arrived. One of our trading companies wants to set up a trading fort at the border. This would benefit us, but would anger our neighbours. What should we do?
TEXT.German: Sire, ein Bote ist angekommen. Eine unserer Handelsgesellschaften möchte an der Grenze ein Handelsfort errichten. Dies würde uns nützen, aber unsere Nachbarn erzürnen. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: Sire, a messenger has arrived. One of our trading companies wants to set up a trading fort at the border. This would benefit us, but would anger our neighbours. What should we do?
TEXT.Spanish: Sire, a messenger has arrived. One of our trading companies wants to set up a trading fort at the border. This would benefit us, but would anger our neighbours. What should we do?
