TEXT.English: A trading fort provokes the minds of neighbouring settlers!
TEXT.French: A trading fort provokes the minds of neighbouring settlers!
TEXT.German: Ein Handelsfort erregt die Gemüter benachbarter Siedler!
TEXT.Italian: A trading fort provokes the minds of neighbouring settlers!
TEXT.Spanish: A trading fort provokes the minds of neighbouring settlers!

TEXT.English: Sire, perhaps it was not such a good idea to build the new trading fort on this border after all. Our neighbours really resent it.
TEXT.French: Sire, perhaps it was not such a good idea to build the new trading fort on this border after all. Our neighbours really resent it.
TEXT.German: Sire, es war vielleicht doch keine so gute Idee, das neue Handelsfort an dieser Grenze zu errichten. Unsere Nachbarn nehmen es uns wirklich übel.
TEXT.Italian: Sire, perhaps it was not such a good idea to build the new trading fort on this border after all. Our neighbours really resent it.
TEXT.Spanish: Sire, perhaps it was not such a good idea to build the new trading fort on this border after all. Our neighbours really resent it.

TEXT.English: Sire, a messenger has arrived. Our neighbours are demanding that we tear down the new trading post immediately. They are really angry.
TEXT.French: Sire, a messenger has arrived. Our neighbours are demanding that we tear down the new trading post immediately. They are really angry.
TEXT.German: Sire, ein Bote ist angekommen. Unsere Nachbarn verlangen, dass wir das neue Handelsfort umgehend wieder abreißen. Sie sind wirklich ungehalten.
TEXT.Italian: Sire, a messenger has arrived. Our neighbours are demanding that we tear down the new trading post immediately. They are really angry.
TEXT.Spanish: Sire, a messenger has arrived. Our neighbours are demanding that we tear down the new trading post immediately. They are really angry.

TEXT.English: The Crown expresses its disapproval of your arbitrary actions!
TEXT.French: The Crown expresses its disapproval of your arbitrary actions!
TEXT.German: Die Krone bringt ihr Missfallen über Euer eigenmächtiges Handeln zum Ausdruck!
TEXT.Italian: The Crown expresses its disapproval of your arbitrary actions!
TEXT.Spanish: The Crown expresses its disapproval of your arbitrary actions!

TEXT.English: His Majesty has heard that you have taken the fort from the Royal Trading Company just to ingratiate yourself with your neighbours.
TEXT.French: His Majesty has heard that you have taken the fort from the Royal Trading Company just to ingratiate yourself with your neighbours.
TEXT.German: Sire, seiner Majestät ist zu Ohren gekommen, dass ihr der königlichen Handelsgesellschaft das Fort genommen habt, nur um Euch bei Euren Nachbarn lieb Kind zu machen.
TEXT.Italian: His Majesty has heard that you have taken the fort from the Royal Trading Company just to ingratiate yourself with your neighbours.
TEXT.Spanish: His Majesty has heard that you have taken the fort from the Royal Trading Company just to ingratiate yourself with your neighbours.

TEXT.English: A river boatman has discovered a mighty shoal of fish in one of the large rivers!
TEXT.French: A river boatman has discovered a mighty shoal of fish in one of the large rivers!
TEXT.German: Ein Flußschiffer hat einen mächtigen Fischschwarm in einem der großen Ströme entdeckt!
TEXT.Italian: A river boatman has discovered a mighty shoal of fish in one of the large rivers!
TEXT.Spanish: A river boatman has discovered a mighty shoal of fish in one of the large rivers!

TEXT.English: Captain, look! The river is so full of fish that they even jump out of the water. If only they would jump into our nets, we would be made men!
TEXT.French: Captain, look! The river is so full of fish that they even jump out of the water. If only they would jump into our nets, we would be made men!
TEXT.German: Captain, seht nur! Der Fluss ist so voller Fische, dass sie sogar aus dem Wasser springen. Wenn sie uns nur auch so in die Netze springen, sind wir gemachte Leute!
TEXT.Italian: Captain, look! The river is so full of fish that they even jump out of the water. If only they would jump into our nets, we would be made men!
TEXT.Spanish: Captain, look! The river is so full of fish that they even jump out of the water. If only they would jump into our nets, we would be made men!

TEXT.English: A ship ran aground in poor visibility!
TEXT.French: A ship ran aground in poor visibility!
TEXT.German: Ein Schiff ist bei schlechter Sicht auf Grund gelaufen!
TEXT.Italian: A ship ran aground in poor visibility!
TEXT.Spanish: A ship ran aground in poor visibility!

TEXT.English: Captain, the ship is sinking! We have already made several feet of water because several planks have been dented. The bosun cannot seal the leak. Give the order "All hands abandon ship" or we'll all perish!
TEXT.French: Captain, the ship is sinking! We have already made several feet of water because several planks have been dented. The bosun cannot seal the leak. Give the order "All hands abandon ship" or we'll all perish!
TEXT.German: Captain, das Schiff sinkt! Wir haben schon mehrere Fuß Wasser gemacht, weil mehrere Planken eingedrückt wurden. Der Bootsmann kann das Leck nicht abdichten. Gebt den Befehl "Alle Mann von Bord" oder wir gehen alle drauf!
TEXT.Italian: Captain, the ship is sinking! We have already made several feet of water because several planks have been dented. The bosun cannot seal the leak. Give the order "All hands abandon ship" or we'll all perish!
TEXT.Spanish: Captain, the ship is sinking! We have already made several feet of water because several planks have been dented. The bosun cannot seal the leak. Give the order "All hands abandon ship" or we'll all perish!

TEXT.English: We will fulfill the orders of his Majesty!
TEXT.German: Wir werden den Befehl Ihrer Majestät erfüllen!

TEXT.English: For the Glory and Wealth of the Motherland!
TEXT.German: Für Ruhm und Reichtum des Heimatlandes!

TEXT.English: For the Glory and Wealth of the Colonies!
TEXT.German: Für Ruhm und Reichtum der Kolonien!

TEXT.English: Deliver the following amount of goods to Europe [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]before any other Nations does[COLOR_REVERT]: [NEWLINE]%D1_amount %F2_yield
TEXT.German: Liefere die folgende Warenmenge nach Europa [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]bevor es eine andere Nation tut:[COLOR_REVERT] [NEWLINE]%D1_amount %F2_yield

TEXT.English: Deliver the following amount of goods to the colonies [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]before any other Nations does[COLOR_REVERT]: [NEWLINE]%D1_amount %F2_yield
TEXT.German: Liefere die folgende Warenmenge in die Kolonien [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]bevor es eine andere Nation tut:[COLOR_REVERT] [NEWLINE]%D1_amount %F2_yield

TEXT.English: Citizens of our Homeland are exited by the quality of our Colonial goods. [NEWLINE]His Majesty is delighted. Demand for our colonial goods is rising.
TEXT.German: Die Bürger des Heimatlandes sind von der Qualität unsere Kolonialwaren begeistert. [NEWLINE]Ihre Majestät is hocherfreut. Die Nachfrage nach unseren Waren steigt.

TEXT.English: The race to dominate the [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] Market in Europe has started.
TEXT.German: Das Rennen zur Beherrschung des Markt in Europe für [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Zucker[COLOR_REVERT] hat begonnen.

TEXT.English: His Majesty and the citizens of the Homeland are delighted by the first deliveries of Colonial [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] from the Colonies. His Majesty thus orders you to become the dominant market leader for that good.
TEXT.German: Ihre Majestät und die Bürger des Heimatlandes sind von den ersten Lieferungen von [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Zucker[COLOR_REVERT] aus den Kolonien begeistert. Ihre Majestät befiehlt euch daher der dominante Marktführer für diese Ware zu werden.

TEXT.English: A Colonial Nation succeeded first to dominate the [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] Market in Europe.
TEXT.German: Einer Kolonialmacht ist es zuerst gelungen den Markt in Europe für [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Zucker[COLOR_REVERT] zu beherrschen.

TEXT.English: We have succeeded to become the dominant market leader for trade with [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Uns ist es gelungen der dominante Marktführer für den Handel mit [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Zucker[COLOR_REVERT] zu werden.

TEXT.English: We have succeeded to fulfill the orders of His Majesty to become the dominant market leader for trade with [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT]. His Majesty is in generous mood and wants to reward us.
TEXT.German: Uns ist es gelungen die Befehle Ihrer Majstät zu erfüllen und der dominante Marktführer für den Handel mit [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Zucker[COLOR_REVERT] zu werden. Ihre Majstät will uns dafür belohnen.

TEXT.English: A Colonial Nation succeeded first to dominate the [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]coca leaves[COLOR_REVERT] Market in Europe.

TEXT.English: We have succeeded to become the dominant market leader for trade with [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]coca leaves[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Uns ist es gelungen der dominante Marktführer für den Handel mit [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Kokablätter[COLOR_REVERT] zu werden.

TEXT.English: We have succeeded to fulfill the orders of His Majesty to become the dominant market leader for trade with [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]coca leaves[COLOR_REVERT]. His Majesty is in generous mood and wants to reward us.
TEXT.German: Uns ist es gelungen die Befehle Ihrer Majstät zu erfüllen und der dominante Marktführer für den Handel mit [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Kokablätter[COLOR_REVERT] zu werden. Ihre Majstät will uns dafür belohnen.

TEXT.English: The race to dominate the [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]furs[COLOR_REVERT] Market in Europe has started.
TEXT.German: Das Rennen zur Beherrschung des Markt in Europe für [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Felle[COLOR_REVERT] hat begonnen.

TEXT.English: His Majesty and the citizens of the Homeland are delighted by the first deliveries of Colonial [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]furs[COLOR_REVERT] from the Colonies. His Majesty thus orders you to become the dominant market leader for that good.
TEXT.German: Ihre Majestät und die Bürger des Heimatlandes sind von den ersten Lieferungen von [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Felle[COLOR_REVERT] aus den Kolonien begeistert. Ihre Majestät befiehlt euch daher der dominante Marktführer für diese Ware zu werden.
